text: Let the enemy come! We will weather this storm together!
Sage words, friend. They shall echo through history.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Brave, noble words! Can we fight now?
They are ready, why aren't you?
Your words embolden me! Let us do great deeds!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Our defeat spreads chaos. That must end.
We must crush these insects!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Should your loyalty falter I will be waiting.
The heat is relentless. I, too, will not stop.
Come, friend, let us take the fight to them.
Alternatively, you could surrender? No? Very well.
Your treason shall be met with fury and blood!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
A thousand blessings to whoever kills that traitor!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
This is the hour in which their power shatters.
Keep your focus. Do not let their allies swarm.
Battle is upon us - let us give it our all!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
All this talk masks your fear. Come on; battle is calling!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
You bring disharmony. Please, no more talk.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Let us be done with this.
Long have I waited for this moment…
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
It is time to die, traitor.
Our fires burn brighter together!
Even allied, you cannot stop me! I am your doom!
We dare to fight again. We shall win!
I am far worse than anything beyond these walls!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
From these walls, we will send them to their graves!
That is certainly an opinion.
Today, we will cripple their campaign for good.

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
More than China, friend, for the Mandate of Heaven itself! China must be ruled by a strong and just Han dynasty. Only we have the power to create that reality!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
I am glad of your company today.
There is a foulness to this cause…
Come, friend, let us take the fight to them.
When battle is done, we will feast!
We cannot give them the advantage of victory!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
A storm is coming. It will sweep you all away!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Give tribute to the moon before battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
All traitors must die, no matter their power!
Long have I waited for this moment…
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
We have committed much; do not squander this opportunity.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Let us talk more once our enemies are dead!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now let us fight.
You have your uses, but you are a cur!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Be as the torrential rain, and sweep these traitors away.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Talk is for later! The battle is upon us!
I am the unbreakable blade. Throw them back!
Our enemies must die. They must die now.
I do enjoy our regular battles!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Push back these thoughtless beasts!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
I do not yield, even now. I will win!
It is time to die, traitor.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Be swift, and smart, and we will see glory.
Is this not proof they all should die?
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
It is time for bureaucracy, not war. Let us be swift.
Let us burn bright like the summer sun!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
We should strike whilst spirits are high!
Your words embolden me! Let us do great deeds!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
They have fought well, but now it ends.
They will face my fury for their insolence!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Cowards and turncoats will face my rage!
This weather could overwhelm the mightiest of warriors…
Flow like a mighty river, unyielding in the drought.
I place my faith in your ability today, and in you.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
We must win! The alternative is death.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
A final struggle, and they will finally be done.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Fair words, brother, let us bring them fury!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
The fire spreads! We cannot be stopped!
No time to wait! Their end approaches!
This is it. Wash them away, never to return!

There is a disturbance in these parts; the world is changing like the leaves on the trees. The southern tribes are slow to move, and the Han are ever-greedy. I must look to my own potential in these shifting times - the tribes will need a leader to unify them, to control their various passions, if they are to hold back the tide of Han. I could be that leader, if they will accept me. To earn such devotion, then, I must make these first determined steps...

My life is in these lands, and there are none who will take that from me. No fight, no matter how insignificant, is beneath my attention – I will defend our homes against any threats! Those further north look upon the south as theirs to claim, but they will soon know that the White Tiger is here, protecting his people – any who intrude will face my savage claws!
Allies? Fine. You will ALL face my blade, then!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
There is no time to waste; let us fight!
Endeavour to be as enduring as the perennial spring!
I will await you on the far side of victory.
You have held back the tide of change too long!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Our enemies must die. They must die now.
Time to fight; traitors simply cannot wait to die!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
So long as you fight with us, we cannot fail.
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Fine words before a battle. Now, let us begin.
If we are defeated here, we are hobbled.
Like a tree shedding leaves, we must abandon our doubts!
Ah, spring! The Azure Dragon rises in the east!
Your presence brings disharmony.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Victory today will shatter their spirit and their strength.
Loyalty is hard-won; you have not won mine.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Traitor! I shall cut you down myself!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Nonsense, nonsense! I intend to fight. Do you?
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
This will be no different to the last time.
Haha, spoken truly! Now we must ready ourselves!
I come for vengeance, bloody and without mercy!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
This will be no different to the last time.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Let us be like the sun, friends. Proud and furious!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
I do not need help, but if they insist…
Today we end their struggle. Forever.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
The time has come to topple these fools!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Our enemies will feel the icy tendrils of winter.
I trust my blade, and mine alone.
Be cautious! They bring allies, to inundate us.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
Let us be done with this.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
I will treat you with respect, but must still defeat you.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Our roots are strong; we will achieve much.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Yes, brother! It is time to do great deeds!
I bring my full fury today; do not disappoint me!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
My friend, let us fight for our ideals!
I shall pierce your heart, traitor! Or your head…
Let their dreams fall before our rage!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
Let us test the mettle of these new foes!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
We must cut these traitors down.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
This new season is ours, if we can but seize it!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
They are ready, why aren't you?
In the name of China, we must win.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
My friend, how has it come to this…
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Once more we are drawn to battle one another.
Now, be driven - like the hurricane - to victory!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Well said. Let us look forward.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You will regret ever inciting my anger!
We have endured much for our cause, sister.
Come, my friends, a bright new day awaits!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
See to these oafs quickly and efficiently, then we can move on.
Your words will do. Now comes battle.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
You may well be correct, let us see.
Audacious words, friend.
Once I called you sister, now we are foes.
Do not fret; allies come to aid us!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Cold. So cold. Let battle heat our warring souls!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Your passion is infectious! May it carry us to  victory!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
For China's sake, we have brought our all.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
I have come for these traitors!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Agent of chaos - you face justice.
A toast to our impending victory! Aha!
To yield to you is to yield China itself. Never!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Wealth fades, but my glory will endure…
I shall repay your injury a thousand-fold!
Let not the biting winds dampen your zeal!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now let us fight.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Time for them to die.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
It is often the sharpest strike that fells the tree fastest…
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
As the world turns, nature is illuminated.
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
We must be prepared to do our part!
Do not hesitate! Don't even think! Crush them here!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
These cowardly filth before us are less than men.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
It is time to die, traitor.
I will not be upstaged by YOU. Fight me!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Do not disappoint me! Fight hard!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Great deeds are born with the world; onwards!
Come, my friend; battle awaits.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Even you cannot halt my advance!
Cut them down. Do not hesitate. Victory requires dark deeds!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
I seek harmony. Your words portend chaos! Battle awaits!
Have care, friend, for I will not show mercy.
Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
All who oppose me will be crushed.
Summer is gone; and so soon shall they be!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Potent words, all - let your actions be mightier!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Perennial enemy, we meet again!
To yield to you is to yield China itself. Never!
Talk less, fight more. I have need of strength, not bluster.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak with honour, brother.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Are you here to help? How amusing.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
In unity, we will strike our enemies down!
Their friends come; they too, will taste defeat!
We shall grind the enemy into dust!
We must crush these insects!
Well said. Let us look forward.
May the cold and the dark take China's foes!
Let China's new beginning start here, my friend.
They must face their defeat with bravery, or else they will be forever shamed.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Your treachery is exposed by the blinding sun!
These new foes will die like the rest!
Do not be disheartened by autumn's flight, friends.
Your treason will be answered with fury!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
I cannot show mercy, friend. Mercy is defeat.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Enough! Die, you filthy usurpers!
Stick with me, sister, and we will defeat them all!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
The fates will turn, and victory will be mine!
It is freedom or death, friends. Onwards!
Another bout? To the fray, then!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
They will fall as many times as is necessary.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
You may be terrible, but you can fight.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
To save China, I must end these enemies!
I am sorry, friend. This will be a mercy.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
I cannot wait to fight alongside you, friend!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
The people must be defended from these savage invaders!
Fiercely prosecute my word; kill all traitors!
Bring your fury, we will surely need it!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
Our past misdeeds must be accounted for. Seize victory!
They are a blight on all of China.
I have come for these traitors!
It is wise that they have brought allies. No matter.
Do not let our victories twist into foolhardy arrogance.
Well said. Let us look forward.

It is plain that the Mandate of Heaven has been lost to the Han. Yet do not presume, cruel tyrant, that it falls to you. You, Dong Zhuo, are the architect of China's chaos, and only through your defeat can order be finally restored.
You may survive the foe, but perhaps not me.
I will right the wrongs of last time!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Destroy them! Leave nothing for them to rally around!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
I will drown you in an ocean of blood!
They think to take this place? Think again.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
It is time we finally settled the score…
China has no time for your stupidity. Quiet! Fight!
Your prattle is driving me to drink!
I will repay this slight!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
I am fire. I am fury. I am the Sun!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
I am beyond your power. You cannot stop me.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Come along, your words can wait.
You bring disharmony. Please, no more talk.
We fight as nature crumbles and recedes…
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Our words are spent. Only battle remains.
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
Are you all so preoccupied with your delusions of grandeur!?
You speak with honesty and clarity, friend.
Argh! Enough words from your useless mouth!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
We must fight as one, until we have victory!
Our diligence has borne fruit. Now, onwards!
Hah. What nonsense! Fight well or die, fool!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Be wary, be cautious. They are not friends…
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
…we know these ones and their ways. Plan accordingly!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.

The people suffer under callous warlords and brutal tyrants. I weep for China, but only we can provide the salve that the people sorely need. We MUST restore the Han dynasty to its rightful place, if we are ever to know unity, stability and peace!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Time to extinguish their light forever!
Though we walk different paths, they have led us here.
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
There can be no harmony whilst this savage yet lives.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Your integrity is astounding. It will serve us well.
Choose the manner of your destruction, traitor!
I have come for these traitors!
I earnestly pray that this battle is your last.
Again they come? Hah! Let them try.
Come, brother, let us strike them down!
Nature flies to death as we fly to battle!
Summer bears down like an inferno. We must endure.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
You speak true.
You speak with honour, sister.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
Blossoms on the branches; passion in our hearts!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
I am honoured to be fighting with you today.
Temper rages against resolve; we fight these dogs again!
Do not hesitate. Commit everything! Defeat them!
Can you fight? Or simply talk?
My blood runs bold like the sun above!
Do not rush to battle, or their allies will overwhelm us.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Through reflection, I will absolve my defeat.
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Your pride is going to get you killed, you know…
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
I look forward to seeing how you fare today.
You again? Oh, very well, I suppose.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Feel the heat! Feel the fury!
A series of miscalculations has led to this…
Our generous allies will help us seize victory
Battle will not wait until you are done pontificating, fool!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Simple strategy, perfectly executed. That is victory.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Only through our control can China know peace.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
These gutless cowards cannot even fight alone!
You speak with honour, sister.
Liberation lies beyond this battle, my friends!
Our branches grow and strangle. None can stand against us.
Smash them apart! Leave nowhere for them to hide!
War does not wait for talk! We must fight!
It is time we finally settled the score…
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
You are a tactical necessity. Nothing more.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
It is time to fight! Time to kill! Time to win!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
No matter what, let unity be our strength, sister!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Not all trees can live. Some must die…
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
You are a powerful foe. I will defeat you!
We have thought long enough. Now, battle is come.
Once a faithful companion. Now an enemy. Very well.
Come. Fight me. I am ready this time!
Be smart, and be thoughtful. They will not stand a chance.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
We have come this far! We cannot fail here!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Only through understanding can we gain victory.
Be merciless here and their power will be broken.
Now let us show them the strength of our beliefs.
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Victory is our only option. There is no alternative.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Their advance stops here. We will repel them!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
We are returned, stronger than before.
Let us see you fight. I have my doubts.
It is gruesome task, but it must be done. So get to it.
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Together, friends, we shall push them back!
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
I'm coming for you, you bloody dogs!
Their biggest mistake was crossing me…
I must be as dispassionate as the blazing sun.
I shall lead you from the battlefield to the harvest.
Let them try to take this settlement!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Vile words from a vile cur. Be silent and fight.
With a sharp, powerful cut, this tree shall fall.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
These enemies are powerful. We must be cautious.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Now let us put these enemies of China to the sword!
No matter the season, all traitors must be destroyed!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Take strength from the bounteous ground, friends!
All enemies must be put to the sword.
All this empty talk! Will we ever battle!?
This treachery damages the land. It must be destroyed.
Silence! I am likely to succumb to old age before this battle ever begins…
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
We must focus on battle, not on your redundant thought.
The unknown is dangerous. Keep your guard up.
Present to them a united, harmonious force.
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
History will forget them. WE will destroy them!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Every enemy has potential strength. Be cautious.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Do not give me further reason to doubt…
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
All of China will feel the bitter cold of your treason!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
If we are defeated here, we are hobbled.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Why must I be saddled with your insulting presence?
I will toast to your health, and our victory!
This city is too vital; they must not take it!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Let the strength of this force tip the balance.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Is it not once burned, twice shy? Apparently not!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Do you always talk this much? It is exhausting!
Patience, friend - victory will be ours in time.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
They must be destroyed. This is where they fall.
Die here, or fight tomorrow. Only one choice…
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Any obstacle can be overcome by our unyielding spirit!
You feel battle will be kinder this time? Hah, unlikely.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Choose the manner of your destruction, traitor!
The enemy cannot hope to stand against our alliance!
Our bond is forged in the fires of war!
Soon they will be no more than mulch for the forests.

I have no real love for warfare, nor for battling my own kin, but when opportunity beckons, only the fool ignores its call. The emperor is chosen by the divine; this is true. To oppose him is treason, yet there is still power to be gained by standing tall at his side…
You speak earnestly, and inspiringly. Now look to battle.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
You are a powerful foe. I will defeat you!
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
I have come for these traitors!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Glorious battle! Come at me once more, old foe!
We must persist. Everything depends on it!
I will see you fall!
I feel a rot set in. I worry…
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
My blade and my wits are sharper this time!
Do not presume you have the right to speak.
Together, we can hold back any assault!
Together, brother, we will unify China!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
I expect you to fight, not talk, so get to it!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
Traitors and dogs, prepare - I'm coming!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Time for them to die.
The sun, high and heavy, reflects our weighty responsibility.
We have no choice but to win today.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Push yourself to victory. I will be waiting!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Once I called you brother, now we are foes.
You have held back the tide of change too long!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
The law is clear. Death to traitors.

China balances on the tip of a spear - which way will it fall? I honestly care not, so long as the battle is worthy. Are there any who would face my might? Any who CAN!? I have felled a thousand men and will fell a thousand more.
This will be no different to the last time.
I wish to break you, but I will… wait.
Once more we are drawn to battle one another.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Now, let us fight, for a stable, unified China!
We must be victorious, or face dark times.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
When I am done, they will be ERASED!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Defeat would leave us vulnerable. Hold fast for victory!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Yes, yes! You speak true! But now we must fight!
Show me your worth! Die with honour!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
The world wearies in summer, but we must not!
Do your duty. I will not waste time with you.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Throw them back! Chase them from our lands!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
For all this talk, the enemy still breaths. Onward!
Your bravery is admirable, but foolish!
Foul collaborators. They shall all suffer!
Do not speak to me. Only do your duty.
We have no choice but to win today.
You are insufferable, but useful I suppose.
Our cause, friend, cannot pause for our friendship…
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Beneath the hues of autumn, battle is joined…
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Through constant battle, we gain understanding…
You speak, when you should fight. Come on!
Do not hesitate. Commit everything! Defeat them!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
You speak well, but now battle is upon us!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
I have no fear, nor should you!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
My blade sings in anticipation of another duel!
This will be no different to the last time.
You speak earnestly, my friend…
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
I spit at you, scoundrels!
I will hold against his horde. They are nothing!
Your friendship is irrelevant. Your opposition is unacceptable.
You are not the leader the people deserve.
Come along, your words can wait.
That so base an enemy could defeat me? Bah!

The Jin dynasty must be upheld, it must thrive! To that end, I will strike any down who threaten the realm, even my own kin. They bicker and squawk like fools. I shall wait no longer! Time, and my patience, grow short - the time to act is now!
If it is decreed we must fight again, so be it.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
This is what we were born to do, sister!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Through unity and introspection, we shall see victory.
Defeat is our past. Victory is our future!

Madness brews both within the imperial court and without. The eunuchs grasp too much control and the 'Yellow Turbans' pillage the land. I have risen from humble beginnings to defend this land, yet if I must become the butcher once more to see it saved, then so be it!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
We have no choice but to win today.
Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn – I think him overzealous!
We must crush these insects!
There is nowhere your treason can hide!
The poets will write histories of their destruction today.
No time to ponder the morals. Only swift action will bring swift victory.
Give your all today, friends. Tomorrow is waiting.
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
The new harvest will be fertilised by blood.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
This place is of strategic importance. We must hold it.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
You are a coward and will die like one!
You are a traitor and shall be washed away!
Ah! Summer, bold and brash! How I enjoy it.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
Now, fury, now! Bear me to victory!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
That is certainly an opinion.
Talk is cheap! Bring these vermin to ruin!
Time for them to die.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
We have no choice but to win today.
Finally, these curs must surely face the sword!
Honour and devotion will be our weapons. Look forward!
The hour of battle has come. Fight with me!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
I smell their fear. They have everything riding on this.
You are a cunning warrior, but a noisome pain.
Draw your weapon, for battle is upon us!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
I grieve that we must fight but I cannot hesitate!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Constant defeat wearies me. I must win!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
We must crush these insects!
You are nothing but scum. You shall die!
Defend this place, by any means necessary!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Let us be done with this.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
You are sullied by your own actions, traitor.
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Save your words! Break them apart!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
...we have defeated them before; take heart!
I can ask no more than you do your duty.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
All traitors must face the sword! Let us go!
Give not an inch. Throw them back. Crush them!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
You have chosen unwisely but it changes nothing.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
We must crush these insects!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Do not weaken your resolve in this oppressive heat.
I will drown our enemies in a tide of justice!
ANOTHER battle? You ask much of me and more…
That is certainly an opinion.
We hold great power, friend. Let us destroy our enemies!
Come now; the Lord of War will guide you!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
May our allies share our glory in victory!
Somehow you survived? I shall see to that!
Shut up and fight! Before I kill you.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Their lands will be free to claim. Defeat them here!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!

The Han have charged me with ridding the land of warlords, but who are the Han? A court of corruption that refuse to recognise my ability! These Yellow Turbans are brigands - a rabble. They are nothing before my power. China hangs on the brink of catastrophe, and only an iron fist will restore order.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Let us see success, and through it, harmony.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
We have no choice but to win today.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Find wisdom, and victory will surely follow. Onwards!
We will overcome these foes today. We must!
You again! Hmmph! So be it.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Every enemy has potential strength. Be cautious.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Come now, send them back to the weeds!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
We must crush these insects!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
We must crush these insects!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Drown our enemies; let them choke on defeat.
Yes! Show fury in your words and deeds!
All of China will benefit from our success.
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
There are other battles to fight, if you don't mind…
As ever, we must not relent before these foes.

We have long been friends and comrades, Zhou Yu, and so it is with pride and joy I march with you today. There is no other I would rather have at my side, and there is no other I would hope to rebuild China with. Let our victory here lay the foundations!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
A defeated warrior seeks vengeance? I will oblige.
Do not stop until these traitors are dead!
If we are bold, and strong, victory will be ours.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Let us not stand on ceremony? Battle awaits!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
They will find only defeat at the end of our blades.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
All this talk masks your fear. Come on; battle is calling!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Fight with your all, and victory will be our reward.
That is certainly an opinion.
You have made an unwise decision, 'friend'.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Yes, sister! It is time to do great deeds!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Your prattle brings disharmony. Cease, and fight!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Cowards and brigands! Hiding behind their allies.
They have allies. Be cautious. Bend, do not break.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Though it is cold, our duty must still be done.
Maybe you can be changed, but I doubt it.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
We must be swift, before we all freeze here.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This had better be a good battle…
Bend but never break. Always remember this.
Such talk is to be expected from you!

The wars of men are such curious things; bombastic but fleeting, they crash upon the land like the winds upon the mountainside; without meaning or direction. Yet so often, they wound nature, leaving scars not so easily mended. It is then my ire is risen - it is now. I must uncoil like the serpents in the grass, and with my venom drain the life of those who would – whether knowing or unknowing – do us harm.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Sharpen your steel - this time we win!
Wisely spoken; now let us do your words justice!
It is time we finally settled the score…
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Observe! The White Horse rides to battle!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!

This darkness in China is born of the darkness in men's hearts. Through callous, dishonourable deeds, 'great' men try to doom this country. Yet you, noble Zhang Liao, stand apart. We may be foes, but you are beyond reproach. Though we may be opposed, I am gladdened that there are still those in China who hold honour above all.
War is an ugly business; not all battles lead to epic tales of heroism…
Come, friend, let us see the courage of your words.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
I applaud your boldness, but it is useless.
Honour and devotion will be our weapons. Look forward!
Let none stand against our unified strength!
Victory will be mine. Defeat will be erased.
You speak true.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Be smart, and be thoughtful. They will not stand a chance.
It is time to bring glory to our cause!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Soon they will be no more than mulch for the forests.
Let history repeat; let my victory be heralded!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Fighting with you today gets my blood pumping!
To battle, sister! Show me your rage!
Fight well, friend, for I cannot show mercy.
They call me 'tyrant'? I will SHOW you tyranny!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
I hope their skills have improved since last time.
Too much talk! Let us go!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Let China's new beginning start here, my friend.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
You speak the truth! Now, no more dallying!

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
We shall be carried along by a wave of victory!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Given the chance, I would kill you.
Win here, and they are gone FOREVER!
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Let their bodies fall amongst the frigid wastes.
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Our resolve is just. Never waver!
Trust in my power, brother, and we will achieve much.
Brigand, face your death!

Since my father's death, I have had to be the guiding force for our family. Everything I have done is for them, every battle I fight is for them. The southlands must be ours, so that our people may thrive and find peace away from the chaos. This is my mission, and I will see it done. The weight of my lineage weighs heavily upon me - I cannot fail!
Once I called you sister, now we are foes.
We toiled for this city; we will not give it up!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Together, let us push this rabble back!
Our combined fury will surely overwhelm them!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress – by such criteria, it cannot be you.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Stay warm by fighting all the more fiercely, friends!
Let victory be ours again, and rightly so.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
Yes, brother! We shall fight together always!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Time for them to die.
The sun beats down, but we must press on.
Their wave shall splash harmlessly against us and recede.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Your prattle is of little help! Fight, instead!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!

I know two truths: my brother is the rightful emperor, and good governance can come only from unification. Any who deny these truths are my enemy, be they friend, foe or family. In my brother's name, I will march to war, and defend the land.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Not all trees can live. Some must die…
You are low and ugly; that cannot be changed.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
We must fight all the harder against this punishing heat.
You speak with honour, sister.
My vengeance is all of China's!

If China is to be unified, it is not the likes of Dong Zhuo who will bring lasting peace. No, dogs like him must be hunted down and destroyed. China has no need of brutal warmongers - cast them into the fires of history!
Together, there is nothing we cannot do!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Come friends, let us share in victory together!
They will cause anguish no longer.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
We shall fight together, sister, once again!
You distress me. Do your duty. Be silent.
Why waste your breath? You will be dead soon!
I am proud to call you brother.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Be as the torrential rain, and sweep these traitors away.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
This cannot go on. We either win, or die!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Yes, well said! Now let battle be joined.
Do not give them a chance for vengeance!
There is no time for guilt. Victory awaits, so see this done!
Leave nothing for the birds - kill every traitor!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Though the world is reborn, its purpose remains unchanged.
That we must crush these foes is plain to see. That they will die quickly is even more obvious.
When battle is done, we will feast!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
You have long opposed me. Now, I will destroy you.
Together, sister, we will unify China!
Let us be like the cold grasp of winter.
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Our generous allies will help us seize victory!
The leaves fall... So too must our enemies.
I have no duty to protect you, so fight well.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Extinguish their wavering flame. Crush their spirit.
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response; death!
I have come for these traitors!
Now let us show them the strength of our beliefs.
This coward is a traitor to his people!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Consider our last defeat, and we will realise victory.
May my blade be as sharp as the autumn winds!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
How are you still alive? It is a grim miracle.
When this battle is done, seek me out.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Come along, your words can wait.
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Now we take the fight to them! Give no quarter!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
I will die of old age before you are ready!
The fate of a traitor is total oblivion.
I will burn the hearts from these savages!
Let us be as merciless and brutal as the sun!
Too many bouts to count. And another? Fine.
Let the autumn come. We fight beneath the moon's gaze.
Your strength will lead us to victory, friend.
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. <laughs> Now, again?
The tide rises against you, traitor!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
What tricks do you employ that constantly vex me!?
Are we foolish to bring this many? No, decisive!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Rush them, quickly, and be done with it!
Do our dreams die here? We must hold fast!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
How has it come to this? Win, or die!
With me, friend; your heady words can wait!
I will bring change to China. You will bring ruin.
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
I shall breach these walls and slaughter these holdouts.
Spring blooms once more. How harmonious.
Bring your best, my brother, and we will be victorious!
There is a furious truth to your words, brother!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
The branch that breaks is no longer of the tree…
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
We must find our centre - then we will know success.
One final battle, and they shall fade forever…
You are to me as family. Together, we shall prevail.
Nothing can stand in our way. Especially not this rabble.
There is such poetry in the rebirth of nature.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Make haste. I am compelled to be elsewhere.
The time for talk is over. Shall we fight?
Let us be done with this.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Ah, old enemies emerge once more. Again, we fight.
Now, fly, like the Vermillion Bird, to victory!
This will be no different to the last time.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Fight well, knowing our allies support us!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Their treason has brought them to oblivion's door!
This man fights only for himself. A disappointing choice.
That is certainly an opinion.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I will tear you apart for ever besting me!
I am Dong Zhuo, and I will NOT fade away.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
This would be a stinging loss. Deny them.
Fear no strangers. Fear nothing. Courage! Victory!
What's this? Fresh faces! Haha, very well!
Let us talk more once our enemies are dead!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
It is time to finish them off. Just as planned.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
My blade is drenched in your blood!
They will fall before our combined fury.
You are the solid foundation for our strength!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Brother; today we fight for all of China!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Your death will see justice finally served!
Wise words, but action is better!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Summer heat behoves a speedy resolution…
Make no mistake; I will outdo you today!
You speak with honour, brother.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Dull! I will grind your bones to dust!
If you fall in battle, I will think it just.
When battle is done, we will feast!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
If we must fight, then so be it.
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
I will not spare you because we were friends!
A righteous war must be fiercely fought!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Come along, your words can wait.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
The bulk of our force is here; defeat cannot be allowed.
The people must be defended from these savage invaders!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their … superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Come along, your words can wait.
I will run these dogs down with righteous fury!
The colours change. What does this portend, I wonder?
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Be brave today, for there is no retreat.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Let us be as furious as the blazing sun.
We must uproot our foes, whoever they may be!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
These cowardly filth before us are less than men.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Come along, your words can wait.
You face my wrath again! Truly foolish!
Let us be furious like the blazing sun!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Let those words carry us to victory.
Long have I waited for this moment…
Their allies will not save them if we fight well.
The stakes are high. Show fury and courage!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Come along, your words can wait.
The time is now! Show me your valour!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
I sense a chance for vengeance!
Well said - now let your words become action.
Can you fight? Or simply talk?
Is this all? I suppose we must do quick and dirty work today.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Abject cruelty is an acceptable punishment for their deception.
Come, friends. We have much to do!
Be mindful; soon this will be over, and our foes finished.
Winter advances, to be sure, but we must not relent.
Be mindful; soon this will be over, and our foes finished.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
I will fight you AND your allies. It matters not!
We should renew, as spring renews the earth.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Behold these villains, undeserving of even your rage!
If we must fight, then so be it.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Together, we will free the people!
The core of our strength is here. Should we fail…
Traitors must be crushed, again and again!
…they have bested us before. Be vigilant. Be smart.
We must be as patient as the blossoms.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Your words soothe my soul, friend.
You speak too much, and fight too little.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Our allies bring great strength. Together, we are unstoppable!
I shall deal with you later. For now, FIGHT!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Let us be done with this.
Through patience, we will see victory.
Past victory is no guarantee of future victory.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
Are you really any better than our hated foes?
You may well be correct, let us see.
Long have I waited for this moment…
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Our allies bring great strength. Together, we are unstoppable!
All of China rises up against this cruelty!
Such talk is to be expected from you!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Our mighty tree stands alone against the deadly typhoon…
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Even with their allies, they cannot defeat me!
Bring as many allies as you want. They cannot save you.
We must achieve more. We must strive higher!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Only through your silence can I know peace.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
There is no other I would wish to battle alongside!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Are you strong enough? Show me.
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Talk is cheap! Vengeance is the prize!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Bravery in the face of this chill scene, friends!
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
I cannot allow my reputation to remain tarnished!
I shall drink to my success, and their impending humiliation!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
I must focus on duty and not our friendship…
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
I have come for these traitors!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
My friend, it is time to teach them a lesson!
However victory must be claimed, go and claim it!
To yield to you is to yield China itself. Never!
This campaign lacks care, lacks thought..
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Yes yes yes! Let us fight, at last!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Brigand, you face your death!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
You may well be correct, let us see.
Bolstered by our allies, our chances are much improved!
I am fortunate, so I will give my all!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Honeyed words, for a coward!
Cease your dull chatter! The enemy stands before us!
Wash these fools away. They are not worthy of our time.
Haha! My friends, follow behind me! Victory awaits!
My loyalty is earned; it cannot be taken!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
If we should die, at least we die together.
The world will bow before our power.
It is time we finally settled the score…
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
The forests grow, the plants blossom, and war comes.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Too many times have we tasted defeat. No more!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Victory is ours to claim, so let us claim it!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
My friend, how has it come to this?
These new blossoms shall witness a new China.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
The sun is capricious; it both gives life, and drains it.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Hardly worth the effort… cut them down, then let us move on.
Let summer come, let the sun burn. Let victory be mine.
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Know your enemy… remember these words!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
There is no room for failure; know this!
I cannot stand the sight of you. Do your duty.
Traitors will be torn limb from bloody limb!
I long for your silence, that we may finally fight.
The shadows grow long, the nights grow darker…

So you claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands – prepare to die!
Time to put the fire amongst them!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Would you stop talking? Please. It bores me.
Every enemy must be swiftly dispatched!
Fearless words, sister! I approve!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Time for them to die.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Time for talk has passed. Now we fight!
United in our endeavour, we shall be unstoppable!
With our allies alongside us, we cannot fail!
Come, friend, we have need of your rage today!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
The branch may bend only so much before breaking.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Haven't you been beaten enough? Very well.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
We must win! The alternative is death.
Again? Not so smart, are we?

I have seen many summers come and go, and seen much bloodshed in the name of peace, yet never have I seen a family turn on itself so. And now they call for my arrest? I do not wish this war, but I must see these accusations quashed - forever.
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We must win! The alternative is death.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
I have come for these traitors!
If you do as instructed, this should be … fine.

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
Uproot their strength here, and they are done!
Prove you can fight, or are you craven?
Now is the time to push back the madness.
Come along, your words can wait.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
A fire burns in my soul;  ceaseless and strong!
Bring me that which I desire - their treasonous head!
I understand, your pride is wounded. Come, try again.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Even newcomers must know the name of Guan Yu!
I spit my drink at you, cowards and traitors!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
My foes will fall before the fury of the sun.
We must defend this city, it is our duty!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
We will do as we must and hold these walls!
There is nothing left for us now but battle.
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Let our duty be as bright and determined as the spring!
Another bout? Another defeat, my friend.
Take care how you proceed. I am watching.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Prepare yourself; I have been waiting for this moment!
It is time we finally settled the score…
What cowards bring allies to fight!?
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
What has been done to earn my strength?
Some trees flourish. Others must die...
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
There is strength in mystery. Do not be arrogant.
…they have bested us before. Be vigilant. Be smart.
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Yes! Let us fight well! Bring your fury!
Hold fast, and fight. To fail is to be destroyed!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You and me. The purity of single combat!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Through our alliance, we will see victory.
Time to go! Time to fight! Time to win!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Win the battle, then I will reconsider your life…
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Defend this city, or answer to me!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Summer is gone; I can finally breathe!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
There won't be much left of you in the end…
Now for vengeance against a baleful foe!
Through harmonious reflection, I will see victory this time.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
Let us be done with this.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
If they are defeated here, they will have nothing.
Throw back their impudent invasion.

Our emperor is beleaguered and his court corrupt; eunuchs whisper selfish lies to him, and in so doing give kindling to the sparks of rebellion. Such sparks will soon swell to an inferno if allowed to persist. I have oft taken the burdens of responsibility upon my shoulders and it seems I must again. No matter the threat facing China, facing the people, I will fight to see knowledge endure, and the land thrive!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
New blood? Aha, or fresh meat?
Fate sees fit to join us once more!
Nature fights again; so do we!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Draw your blade, brigand! I will cut you down!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
China will be ruled by the strong, or by none at all!
You may well be correct, let us see.
Be wise. Keep your wits about you. Kill them.
You speak boldly. Shall we then?
Ugh! How has it comes to this…
Let their allies come; we shall see them off!
Let those words carry us to victory.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Our cause is just! We should never relent!
You speak with honour, sister.
Well said. Now, help me tear these foes apart!
I pray our cause does not deviate any further.
My fortunes will reverse here, I vow it!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
I will repay your cuts a thousandfold.
Traitors are lower than filth.
Shall we then? War waits for nobody.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
For fair or foul, you are my enemy.
Wise and considered strategy will give us countless victories!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.

So you claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Every enemy must be swiftly dispatched!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Must you talk? It brings nothing but pain.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
You sound fearless, friend. It is just as well!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We must stay strong like the unbending branches!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
They cannot be allowed a foothold here!
Time for them to die.
This city cannot fall. Instability will not reign!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Should I cut you down? No. Not yet…
When battle is done, we will feast!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
I have come for these traitors!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Our roots run deep. Brute strength cannot upturn them.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Choose the manner of your destruction, traitor!

So I meet the Crouching Dragon at last; my patience has finally been rewarded. They say you are a most brilliant strategist, and a loyal comrade. It is a pity, then, that we are on opposing sides. Yet as with all the others, you will fall - my ambition cannot be stopped!
You cannot quench my thirst for victory!
These newcomers shall not make this mistake again.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Let us put strength behind those words, my friend!
History only remember the victors. So bring me victory!
I vow I will not suffer defeat again!
All who oppose our liberation must be crushed!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?

Warlords, nobles, emperors – who cares! The only constants are glory, recognition and wealth! Titles are NOTHING – fame is forever. There are no lengths I will not go to, to achieve my ambition. The bodies will pile high, China will BURN, but I WILL be remembered.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
I have come for these traitors!
The sooner we start, the better, for then it will be over more swiftly.
You may be disagreeable, but you have skill.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
It is as you say, friend. War is our only option.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
They are ready, why aren't you?
Will these foes be courageous or craven? Let us see…
I did not come to be lectured, I came to fight!
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Bring me victory or begone from my sight!
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
I should cut out your beastly tongue.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Some things are bigger than our friendship…
A traitor waits for death. Oblige them!
They are ready, why aren't you?
Come along, your words can wait.
Bring me their liar's heads!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Though we do not share a name, I do most certainly call you brothers! For we shall live, and fight, and die as one!
Even in winter, bamboo does not break; stay strong!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I will drown our enemies in a tide of justice!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
The core of our strength is here. Should we fail…
We will be washed away if we are not careful…
War is coming, whether you are ready or not!
I am shown honour and loyalty. Let it continue!
Either commit to the cause, or die.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Our duty remains, even in this savage heat.
I shall take them all apart, piece by piece!
There are greater deeds to be done. Yet duty demands these ones be dealt with now.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Come now, we have no time for this. Only war!
We can overcome any obstacle, friend. I believe that!
They are formidable foes, soaked in our blood.
Bolstered by our allies, our chances are much improved!

What madness consumes China! This fire must be stopped, lest we all burn! The people suffer as cities burn - it cannot continue! For years I have defended China from numerous threats, it seems now I must take up arms to defend her again. Once more, for China!
Victory is our moral obligation. It is written.
This time… this time will be different. I swear it!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Time for them to die.
Hot or cold; I don't care - kill them!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
My mind is askance, clouded. I worry.
Though battered, we shall never break.
Your crime is crossing me. The sentence is death.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Let those words carry us to victory.
You wish to regain lost glory? So be it.
No longer will you bar my path.
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
You have become good practice, if nothing else.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
This waif shall face honest justice at last.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Now, let us fight, for a stable, unified China!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
A change is upon the land; it heralds opportunity!
We have no choice but to win today.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!

The land is plagued by discontent. It is plain to see, yet it is not unexpected, as the imperial court is undermined by corruption. These dark omens portend disaster. All the same, rebellion cannot be tolerated; my people must be kept safe, and to that end I will fight, if only to see peace once more!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Legends are forged in the heat of battle!
If you survive, I will be surprised. And saddened.
This is what we were born to do, sister!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
We will endure, no matter what happens here…
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Prove you are more than scum today.
There are few I trust; you are one.
We have allies? These fools don't stand a chance!
They are wretched, but not without skill. Be cautious.
Now, be driven - like the hurricane - to victory!
Defeat can be a most potent incentive...
Can you keep up? Hah, I hope so.
Come along, your words can wait.
When this done, we shall have victory or oblivion.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Do not give me further reason to doubt…
You have abused the people for too long! No more!
Be wise. Remember these enemies. Fight smart.
Their destruction will ensure the restoration of order!
Battle approaches! The Tiger roars!
We will work hard for victory this day, sister.
I feel exposed... Defeat here would be catastrophic.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Let your vengeful ardour carry you to victory!
Nature is renewed. We, too, must refresh our purpose.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
I shall overcome you, then resume my agenda.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
We must crush these insects!
Smash their heads against these walls!
Let us show we are above these fools!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.

So battle comes at last, and I rise to meet it. I have never sought war, but I do not shirk from the fight! I have built my strength myself, found my way with my own intelligence, and all for my family - any who threaten our way of life will be destroyed. Han, bandit, pirate - it does not matter, they will all fail!
These faces are unfamiliar, yet still they bring war…
I would strike you down, were you any other.
These men are enemies of China - destroy them all!
Their friends come; they too, will taste defeat!
These ones are gluttons for punishment, no?
Today, we will break these fools beyond repair!
The fire spreads! We cannot be stopped!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Hold fast, for our cause is worth the effort!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Do not waste air with vapid prattle.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
