For China's sake, we must hold here!
You speak true.
Victory is our only option. There is no alternative.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Today they will fall, and we shall ascend.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
I have your back, if you have mine!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
This is the war for all of China! We will be victorious!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
Go on then - I shall duel you again!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Dormant buds now burst forth into action!
They send everything against us. So… destroy them!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Together, victory is inevitable. Nothing can stop us.
Your words are calming, sister. To the battle, then?
How has it come to this? Win, or die!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
China will only know stability through our victory.
From our minds springs action. From action, victory.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Should you fall, the earth will grow strong from you.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Push through the heat to victory. We have a duty.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Only through your silence can I know peace.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Prosperity and harmony; these I have in abundance.
Ignoble beast! I have found you!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Your world is done! Time and again we prove this!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
These new foes will soon bend to our will.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
I am coming for you! I will claim my victory.
With me, friend; your heady words can wait!
Darkness will consume China, should we fall here.
They are the enemy of China. They must pay.
We either fight hard to survive, or we die.
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
Their deceit ends now, with our victory!
A fire burns in my soul, ceaseless and strong!
Let us be done with this.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Enough of your disingenuous talk. Battle is coming.

Ah, Sima Yi. I have heard much talk of your strategic prowess - they say it is second to none. They say that I have some knowledge of tactics, so I confess to some interest in this result. Above all, however, I shall endeavour to see your defeat - China cannot be led by one so insidious as you!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Fight hard, for defeat may be our end!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
The hour of battle has come. Fight with me!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
They are ready, why aren't you?
Do you intend to fight at all!?
You speak true.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Do not prove my worries correct. Please.
There are few I would not kill. You, brother, are one.
We must win! The alternative is death.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
We shall wash these insects away in righteous deluge!
Sigh. If it seems impossible, maybe it is…
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Give it your best shot - I am waiting!
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Let us determine whose will is stronger.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
We find ourselves on the battlefield together, it seems. Are we to show our enemies that we are a unified force then? I will not suffer to linger in your shadow.
Without victory here, our days are numbered.
This city is too vital, they must not take it!
Finally, my strategy bears fruit. Destroy them.
Find wisdom, and victory will surely follow. Onwards!
Can you keep up? Hah, I hope so.
When we are done, their light will be greatly dimmed!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
The times have changed! You cannot stop this!
This city is a vital piece in my plans. Defend it.
No time to hesitate - our foes must be crushed!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Did last time not hurt enough? Very well! Again!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Sister; today we fight for all of China!
Their days are numbered. This is all they have.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
This is their last chance. Take this city; vanquish them!
I have no time for poetry; kill them all!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Wars are won by many minds, yet one purpose.
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Our roots are strong; we will achieve much.
Proud words, brother! To the battle then!
You speak with honour, sister.
Destroy them! Leave nothing for them to rally around!
If we are bold, and strong, victory will be ours.
Let history repeat; let my victory be heralded!
That is certainly an opinion.
You cannot halt the future of China!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Together, sworn friend, we will achieve our victory!
Winter's grasp cannot have me. I have work yet to do.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
I shall wipe away the grime of defeat.
We must win! The alternative is death.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
I will burn the hearts from these savages!
Did they not learn last time? Very well
No more! Cut these honourless dogs down!
Bamboo stings so savagely, does it not?
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
You speak true.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
We must crush these insects!
How has it come to this? I refuse to accept it!
All our fortunes ride aloft this battle.
It is time to destroy them, do you not agree?
Enough! Enough! Will you ever give me peace?
For China's sake, we have brought our all.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
We must achieve more. We must strive higher!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Death in battle, before the gods… very well.
Frigid winter cannot match the heat of our souls!
Why must I be saddled with your insulting presence?
No challenge is too great to overcome.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Come, let us tear down their dreams!
They will not beat me here. Not now…
Unity is strength. Strength against oppression!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
They are set up before me, ready to knock down!
I long for your silence, that we may finally fight.
Your alliances will not save you. Nothing will!
They will be drowned by our strategies.
Whoever you are, you cannot stop us!
We are as one mind, friend - we cannot be stopped!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
I am the sun. I shall incinerate my enemies.
It is time to draw swords against these witless fools!
I feel a chill in your presence, my Lady Sun, but I cannot doubt your strength in battle. I only hope you do not see fit to turn your wrath upon your husband…
For China's sake, we have brought our all.
As the trees begin to grow, we too must strike out.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
It is time to die, traitor.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Do not give them a chance for vengeance!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
The outcome may be grim, but it is not foregone.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
You are offensive to the senses. Ugh.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Let us be done with this.
Talk no longer! We ride to battle!
Our flame gutters and gasps. Will it forever die?
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
On and on we go, another day, another battle.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
I pray our cause does not deviate any further.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
I will break them all! None shall survive!
Much is asked of us, but for what?
Let those words carry us to victory.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
I have waited long to see you fail. I will wait longer.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Do not waste time; it only delays your defeat!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!

Though the tortoise blessed with magic powers lives long, its days have their allotted span; though winged serpents ride high on the mist, they turn to dust and ashes at the last; and a noble-hearted man, though advanced in years, never abandons his proud aspirations.
Is the enemy here before us, or within us?
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Your death will be a mercy when I am done, traitor!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
We must crush these insects!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
What nonsense. Still, show loyalty, and we shall succeed!
Let us be like the cold grasp of winter.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Together, we will see this all burn!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Bring your fury today, and they shall be crushed.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Prepare, knave! A reckoning comes!
With each victory, we grow stronger and stronger.
Let the zeal of spring inspire us to victory!
You are empty and vacuous, like your hollow words.
Traitors! I will burn the heart from you!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
We shall remain steadfast before any foe.
A terrible thing, wasted potential.
A cornered tiger should never be underestimated.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
All talk! Do any have the guts to fight!?
What have you become, my dearest friend?
We must cut these traitors down.
Strangers? We will know their hearts soon enough!
Push back, and survive! There is no alternative!
Bring me their heads. For China.
Do you think you can manage a battle? Bah!
Consider our last defeat, and we will realise victory.
From our minds springs action. From action, victory.
Do not let winter claw at your resolve. Come!
Summer is a raging inferno. Harness its power!
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
With me! It is time history forget these dogs!
Spring? How quaint. It shall be your last!
From our minds springs action. From action, victory.
You are beyond even my help now.
I will cut them down quickly. They will learn.
Let these newcomers try; they will taste defeat!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Allies? How best to employ our stalwart friends…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
It's too cold. Battle will warm us up!
There is no room for treason in China!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Ha! Let us drink deep, then go to war!
I have waited a long time for my revenge…
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
I am ready, comrade, when you are!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
We shall not soon forget your words, brother.
We have passion and zeal. Do not waste it!
You speak boldly. Shall we then?
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
You are persistent, aren't you!?
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
My rage is indiscriminate, so beware.
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Do not let your convictions waver. Stand firm!
You are a vermin and you will be purged!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, sister.
There is warmth to be found once battle is done.
Try to come back alive, if you can.
We understand each other. Let us go forward as one.
Though we have never met, give them your all!
Never break, even before the most furious strength.
Time once more to show my skill…
When you are done here, we shall move on. Do not dally.
Let their blood water the fields of China!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
You are nothing but vermin; prepare to die!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Be wary of their friends; a united front is dangerous.
It is time we finally settled the score…
Defeat is temporary. I shall have victory.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Return with victory, or do not return at all.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
We must crush these insects!
Wise and considered strategy will give us countless victories!
When battle is done, we will feast!
You will be crushed beneath my ambition!
You constantly stand in my way. Intolerable!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
My friend, how has it come to this?
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Our allies shall be guiding lights in the dark!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Keep an eye on your flanks, cur…
Bamboo stings so savagely, does it not?
You speak well, but I am itching for combat!
You speak too much, and fight too little.
I have justice on my side. I cannot lose.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
The outcome may be grim, but it is not foregone.
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
They shall break before my endless attack!
Yes, friend. Gallant indeed! Let us go!
Our tide is rising, swelling with victory!
Our patience is rewarded with this final battle.
Run them down; let them freeze!
We must win! The alternative is death.
My friend, how has it come to this?
Our victories bring harmony. Keep them up.
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
We must fight the persistence of the summer heat.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Enough! If you will not fight, I will destroy you!
There will be no quarter, friend. I am sorry.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor – by such criteria, it cannot be you.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Silence your words and your mind. Prepare to die.
There are more important tasks at hand. Hurry up and die.
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Lend me your strength, brother, and nothing can stop us!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
Our branches grow and strangle. None can stand against us.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
We cannot fail here. For if we do…
Fate brings us to battle each other once again.
We clash again. This time will be different.
Fall on your blade if you lack the courage.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Are you here to help? How amusing.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Together, we shall bring transformation to China!
Be furious, and we shall burn our enemies!
I hunger for revenge, and I shall have it!
Vile brigand, prepare to face my blade!
If we should die, at least we die together.
There is cause for optimism, but not for arrogance.
You will all freeze here and nobody will remember you.
Spring at last. I was sick of the cold.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
Old adversaries make the best opponents!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Your words are nought but wind. Be bold!
When battle is done, we will feast!
I will tear the breath from your traitor's lungs!
Do not forget how these ones fight. Be bold!
We find ourselves on the battlefield together, it seems. Are we to show our enemies that we are a unified force then? I will not suffer to linger in your shadow.
Once a faithful companion. Now an enemy. So be it.
Stay with me, sister, and we will achieve much.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
I will flow and repel, time and time again.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
This one is pestilent; he must be removed!
Long have I waited for this moment…

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
That is certainly an opinion.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
This is it. Wash them away, never to return!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
It is often the sharpest strike that fells the tree fastest…
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Now, friends, together let us claim victory!
I will wipe away my previous defeat.
Yes, yes, very well spoken! Shall we fight now?
Our cause is just! Let us fight for it!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
You distress me. Do your duty. Be silent.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
You can rely on me to bring another swift victory.
Learn from our past errors, and we shall win.
It is time to consign them to history.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response; death!
We have brought unrelenting strength. Destroy them!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Stick with me, and we'll do great things.

A dynasty that consumes itself is doomed. We must unite or we will surely be destroyed. The empress has never been a friend to me, yet the Jin must find its common purpose again, united beyond our chosen emperor. Only then will the people once again know who their true rulers are.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
If there is fire in your heart, let it show!
I will not die here. This journey will NOT end!
These fools are about to meet their end.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
You are a mighty bough; unbreakable! It is comforting.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Guan Yu does not tolerate treason!
You are tiresome bores. Come, battle awaits!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
It is time to die, traitor.
We must hold true, or all is lost…
Through constant battle, we gain understanding…
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Together we will crush them!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Through our alliance, we will see victory.
You speak with honour, sister.
You have long been a problem, but no longer!
They are a blight on all of China.
Some trees flourish. Others must die...
I value loyalty. I do NOT value you.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Friend, you speak well. Shall we to battle?
We bend but never break. Through this, we see victory.
I will await you on the far side of victory.
They are ready, why aren't you?
China demands me as its champion, not you!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Indeed! Now let powerful words become powerful deeds.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Ours is the strength of the earth: indomitable!

How long has it been, then? How long have the arrogant Han sniffed at our lands, like hungry dogs? And how long have we lain dormant, barely raising a finger in defence of our people, our homes? I will not be so removed; I will not idle my days away like so many other tribal lords. I will meet the Han with an unreserved passion: a flame of fury born from the goddess herself – and with it, I will burn the empire away!
Proud words, sister! To the battle then!
Let not the darkening skies dishearten you, friends!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Numbers will not avail you! We have truth!
Come, sister, let us strike them down!
They are defenceless without this force. Defeat it!
I have come for these traitors!
Your time, brigand, is now!
They are ready, why aren't you?
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Come, my friend, battle awaits.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Yes, come on. Fight me again!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
The air is icy cold. My breath freezes!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Be fluid, friends, and we will rush to victory.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Traitor! Save your breath. Do not speak.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Allies pour onto the field? What luck!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Let us bring great change to China, together.
Though we were not born on the same day, or the same month, or the same year, we hope to die upon the selfsame day. And should our friendship waver, may heaven and the people both strike us down!
The ebb and flow of battle will yield to me!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
You are unworthy of my respect, traitor.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Let our revolution catch fire, burning them away!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
It is time for their ways to end!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Let those words carry us to victory.
What do they hope to achieve? Hah. No mercy!
Break their bones! Smash their spirit!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
The revolution will endure, no matter the outcome on the battlefield!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Wise and thoughtful words. Let us give them meaning!
You speak with honour, sister.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
I will reclaim the victory stolen from me!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Friend, you have strayed far, too far…
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
They think it cold? Then give them fire!
Win the battle, then I will reconsider your life…
Come along then; I must strike you down again!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
My friend, I count myself lucky you are here.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
And you suppose the heavens will choose YOU to be emperor? Hah, show me your strength then, strategist. We shall see how you fare against my fury!
Our past misdeeds must be accounted for. Seize victory!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
I will break you like an empty wine bottle!
I gift you another battle. Let us get to it!
That is certainly an opinion.
You speak with honour, sister.
You cannot stop me. I will destroy you!
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
The Mandate was lost to the Han long ago! Your opportunism is admirable, your ignorance is not! I cannot allow even the heirs to the Han to drag China back into the abyss.
The core of our strength is here. Should we fail…
That is certainly an opinion.
The branch may bend only so much before breaking.
Traitors are a blight. They must be excised.
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
The world blooms into action, so too must we!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
Show them endless fury, mighty horde!
No. I will not break. I refuse! Not… not now!
Our progress has been adequate. May it continue.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
It is my honour to lead you into battle!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Enough! You should be ready to fight, not bluster!
Drown our enemies; let them choke on defeat
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Do not become a liability to me.
We spilled blood taking this place. Turn them away!
Given the chance, I would kill you.
Push these brigands back! Defend the city!
Bring the fury of your conviction into battle!
You may defeat me a thousand times; I will still fight!
You may well be correct, let us see.
Sister; today we fight for all of China!
I am undefeated, but you may try…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
How many times have I been frustrated by failure now?
It is a good day to die, is it not?
Traitor! Save your breath. Do not speak.
They have allies. Blood and effort will win this...
This is nothing but an obstacle to overcome.
Enough! Enough! Will you ever give me peace?

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!

So I meet the Crouching Dragon at last; my patience has finally been rewarded. They say you are a most brilliant strategist, and a loyal comrade. It is a pity, then, that we are on opposing sides. Yet as with all the others, you will fall - my ambition cannot be stopped!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
A new season rises, and with it our revolution!
You disquiet my mind. Be silent.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
This will be no different to the last time.
Your presence is a reminder that evil exists.
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Hold true, friend, and we cannot go wrong.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
At last, a chance to destroy you!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Let us not squander this momentum! Fight!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
The air is hopeful. It portends great things!
You are right. Let us go to war then.
We shall drench the frozen ground in their blood!
I am the unbreakable blade. Throw them back!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Unlike the leaves, we will not wither on the branch.
With our allies alongside us, we cannot fail!
Once more we are drawn to battle one another.
The shadows grow long, but our light must burn bright!
You will be drowned by your injustices, traitor!
You are a craven dog, but still, fight!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
You speak with honour, sister.
At last. It is time for this traitor to fall.
I do not have time for this petty work, but I suppose it must be done…
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
I cannot abide traitors. You, dog, will face justice!
Your words do not reach them. Only action will.
It is time for these overzealous fools to die!
We must be willing to bend, but never break.
I will have my revenge, this I vow!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Can you talk less? I would be surprised.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
We must be as the incoming tide - relentless!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
It is time to die, traitor.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Their defeat today will leave them crippled and vulnerable.
We are never alone; I am heartened!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
War is come. We are ready! Let us succeed!
You wish to fight again? Very well, fool.
We have committed much; do not squander this opportunity.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
They are obstructers of justice, every man.
I look forward to seeing how you fare today.
This will be no different to the last time.
Our spirits are weary, but we cannot give up.
Like a tree shedding leaves, we must abandon our doubts!
Do not test my patience. I will kill you.
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Rebellion buds, bursting forth with the coming of spring.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
You speak true.
Be fierce. Do not relent, even though this is menial work.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Disharmony is a portend to defeat…
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
The weak of heart have no chance against us.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Traitors are a blight. They must be excised.

I know you as an honourable man, Guan Yu, and a warrior without peer, but the call to duty is stronger than any bond between men. They say you are to be feared for your strength, but I have a strength and cunning of my own. I wish you well, but I shall see my way victory!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
We fight as nature crumbles and recedes…
Our past misdeeds must be accounted for. Seize victory!
You speak with honour, brother.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Your words bring disharmony. Please, be silent.
I am impatient for battle! Fight!
Their corpses will soon litter the battlefield!
I have no time for your words. Only battle!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
Your ignorance astounds me. Still, I expect you to fight.
You think last time hurt? I will show you pain!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Their defeat is necessary.
It is heartening to see so many friends!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
We have waited for this chance to crush them
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
You are cowardly, deserving only of death.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
May this oppressive heat, give way to blazing victory!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their … superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
They must be weak AND stupid, to fight us again!
A stranger tide washes upon our shore…
If we must fight, then so be it.
War waits no longer. Shut up and fight!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Tear them apart, leave nothing for them to salvage!
You have long opposed me. Now, I will destroy you.
I seek harmony. Your words portend chaos! Battle awaits!
You are the solid foundation for our strength!
Do not speak to me. Only do your duty.
Prove your mettle in glorious battle!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
These newcomers are brave. Or foolish!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Our strategies must be flexible. Through change, victory.
Like the mighty Yangtze, overcome these tenacious foes.
The only option is your total annihilation.
Let us now be the fire that consumes them!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands – prepare to die!
If they are defeated here, they will have nothing.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
No one man can win this battle. Yet together, we can.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
I will flow and repel, time and time again.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
I feel these newcomers are not gracious folk…
We rise like a blazing inferno, destructive and unstoppable!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Brother; today we fight for all of China!
Let us share a drink when this is done, sister!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Break through the freezing air to victory!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Overconfidence is the obituary of many an army.
I cannot wait to fight alongside you, friend!
Speak no more. These vermin must die.
We shall resolve our fury in battle!
Speak well, and fight true. That is all I ask.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.

We must be victorious, or face dark times.
What's this? New traitors come to die?
You all talk too much! Fight me!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
We shall not soon forget your words, sister.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
Hold the gates, man the barricades! Give no ground!
Is this truly the best course for China?
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
There can be no harmony whilst this savage yet lives.
If we must fight, then so be it.
I have come for these traitors!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Under our steady hand, China will know peace!
You lack strength. And yet redemption is possible…
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
I will crush you again, as I did before!
Bring your strength, sworn kin, and they will fall.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
The past is the past. We grow towards the future.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Allies? Fine. You will ALL face my blade, then!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Dormant buds now burst forth into action!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
When they lose, and they will, they will be crippled!

So you claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Time for them to die.
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
This desperate fool is in dire need of death!
My blade and my wits are sharper this time!
Their ambitions shall burn this day!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
Reflect a moment friend, on the journey, before the fight.
Come, bar the gates! Not a single foe may pass!
I will reclaim my honour.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
The last time was an oversight. Now, victory will be mine.
Our generous allies will help us seize victory
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
I can hardly endure you. But I must persevere…
We must win! The alternative is death.
How deft you are with words, brother. Well said.
We hold great power, friend. Let us destroy our enemies!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
You all talk too much! Fight me!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
There is a foulness to this cause…
Be like the mighty river; wash them away.
Defeat is temporary. I shall have victory.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
To lose here would be extremely troublesome.
Do right by me and I will do the same.
Can you smell it in the air, friend? Revolution!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
The very fate of China hangs in the balance!
Be knowledgeable, yet unpredictable; victory will follow
Destroy them here, and erase their very existence!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
If you fall in battle, I will think it just.
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come along, your words can wait.
Our enemy will surely be bored to death by now.
None can stop us - especially not these loathsome fools!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
There is no room for treason. Execute them all.
If you cross me, you will be destroyed.

Ah, Sima Yi. I have heard much talk of your strategic prowess - they say it is second to none. They say that I have some knowledge of tactics, so I confess to some interest in this result. Above all, however, I shall endeavour to see your defeat - China cannot be led by one so insidious as you!
Their friends come; they too, will taste defeat!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
We weigh much of our strength here. We must win.
I will exact my vengeance upon you, scum!
That is certainly an opinion.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
It is often the sharpest strike that fells the tree fastest…
Enough. You are in my way.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Do not fear the change of nature. Fear only me.
Come, to battle, leave the speeches for later.
Did you forget the last lesson? Very well then!
They line up again and again to die!
Only constant war can settle grievances of men!
Expose their weaknesses, and remove their defences!
My mind is askance, clouded. I worry.
They have allies. Blood and effort will win this...
How do they keep winning? It infuriates me!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Now for vengeance against a baleful foe!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Our cause is just! Let us fight for it!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
With our loyal friends alongside us, we cannot fail.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Defeat is temporary. I shall have victory.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
We must do what is needed, for China.
I will have your liar's head, you cur!
Bring victory for the cause, or be gone.
Why must you darken my day so?
Yes! Let us be together at the head of the charge!
How shall we fight this one? How indeed…
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Victory is my only concern. Personal feelings are irrelevant.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Your deception will soon be ended. Farewell, traitor.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
They have strength in their allies. Be patient…
I spit at you, scoundrels!
No more defeats. Only victory!
I will fight with you to the very end!
Our roots are strong; we will achieve much.
What more can I ask, but that you fight your hardest!
Push them back! They will not triumph!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Well said. Let us look forward.
Their numbers are irrelevant. Destroy them all!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Well put! Sister, let us be bold!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
War comes, we cannot linger any longer!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
The cause is everything. Freedom or death!
Can you be silent? I wish to forget you are here.
We must crush these insects!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
We have no choice but to win today.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
China is waiting for our victory! Let us go!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Like a vine, you are choking the life from China.
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Shall we, my friend? Battle waits no longer.
We are of one mind, friend. Harmonious.
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Should you die, I will mourn… for a time.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Enough, enough! No more idle chatter. Fight!
Do not test me, brigand.
You will fall because you must. No quarter.
You may well be correct, let us see.
We may bend, but shall strike back more ferociously
To think, that you could cost us victory…
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
The bulk of our force is here; defeat cannot be allowed.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Brother; today we fight for all of China!
Know yourself, and know your enemy. Then we will win.
That is certainly an opinion.
Brave words. Shall we justify them?
Enemies of China! Prepare to meet your doom!
Time to extinguish their light forever!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
We shall drench the frozen ground in their blood!
Leave nothing but cinders of their dreams!
Good words, to be sure, but save them!
Let those words carry us to victory.
The days may shorten, but we cannot rest early.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
I shall break their bodies and burn the remains!
We have done well thus far. I am content.
Through patience, we will see victory.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
It is often the sharpest strike that fells the tree fastest…
When we are done, there will be nothing left of them.
When you are done here, we shall move on. Do not dally.
Fearless words, brother! I approve!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Your constant interruptions are a nuisance, nothing more.
I can barely control my urge to obliterate you.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
I am far beyond the novice you fought before!
There is warmth to be found once battle is done.
I am far beyond the novice you fought before!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Another bout; I must not make the same mistakes…
Can you do your duty today? I hope so.
I must reclaim my lost glory.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
The cold bites at us, yet we must march.
Our cause is righteous. Victory will come to us.
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!

Behold me, China! I am beset by traitors on all sides! Once-proud Luoyang is a smouldering ruin; all of China will burn before their mutiny is over! For this sedition can be answered only with merciless fury! I must be the sword of execution, if China is ever to know order again!
The earth is indifferent. Only determination will yield victory.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Do they not know who it is they face?
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
The leaves fall, but we must remain resolute.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
You speak true.
You speak true.
Let China speak of their defeat for generations!
The world turns, and we battle. On, and on…
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
How can we fail when China is behind us!?
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Brigand! I challenge you! Fight me once more!
Let us give them a worthy ending.
Stick with me, brother, and we will defeat them all!
Quite finished? Shall we do our duties now?
If this is what must be done, I will do it.
See if you can keep up with me!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
They have allies. Be cautious. Bend, do not break.
You speak with honour, brother.
They will know my wrath and shudder.
My loyalty is tested. Can I endure?
You have frustrated my plans for the last time.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
My ambition does not halt for any season.
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Prove yourself! This is no time for talk!
Guan Yu will not cower before you, dogs!
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
I have no time for traitors!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Let us be done with this.
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Let us now, together, see victory won!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
If I cannot have this city, nobody can!
Let those words carry us to victory.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
Hold fast against these traitors' words. They know nothing!
The enemy is awaiting battle. Words can wait.
Having thought on my defeat, I have decided: never again.
There is cause for optimism, but not for arrogance.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Today we end their struggle. Forever.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
You spew nothing but bile, be silent.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
You speak true.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Master Sun teaches caution in the face of the unknown…
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Your words are nought but wind. Be bold!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
I will see them burn for daring to kill me!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Your words are wise. I am honoured to hear them.
You cannot defeat my purpose.
A good battle is its own reward!
Before I die, they will know my fury!
I will not squander this opportunity to exact justice!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
Allies? Fine. All will fall before me.
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
You are my sworn kin. I need no other!
Here they burn! And from their ashes, we shall rise!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Let us see your strength. China is watching.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Together, my friend, we will make them yield.
This is more than our struggle; it is China's
I will not be slighted! I will destroy you!
Well said. Let us look forward.
It is the unknown, creeping vine, that can choke the mightiest tree.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Our spirits burn like the summer sun!
No foe can stand against my ferocity.
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Show courage; our people are counting on us.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
I am here to fight you, not listen to this nonsense.
Our strategies must be flexible. Through change, victory.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
The horizon broods, as does my heart…
Prepare to die, brigand!
From discord, harmony. Their defeat here will be total.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
I shall fight this battle, then we shall see…
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Sister, let us go forward as one.
Let us be done with this.
Hold firm against their might; victory through resolve.
The sun rises. We, too, must rouse for battle.
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
They speak, and I am angered.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
I will cut my enemies down, then YOU!
Fight well, knowing our allies support us!
Enough! Fight me, you hand-fed puppets!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Silence! Are words your only weapon? Draw your blades!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
Should you fall, the earth will grow strong from you.
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?

The people cry out for freedom, for justice! Do you hear them? Their shouts can be heard from every corner of China, and they will not be ignored! I dream of a country without the oppression of uncaring noblemen! I fight for this noble cause. and I will never relent!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Will you provide a challenge? Or an opportunity?
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
You speak true.
Show me what you have to offer…
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Battle beneath the watching moon. Conduct yourselves well.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let us end this!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
This will be no different to the last time.
I suppose I had better finish the job then.
Turn your useless words into action, fool!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
You speak with honour, brother.
The Azure Sky is dead! The Yellow Sky will rise!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
One final strike, and they will be done.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Whatever must be done, will be done.
As my needs are met, so too are China's.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
I shall hold these gates against ten thousand men!
I wish them an honourable defeat, but nothing more.
We bend but never break. Through this, we see victory.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
We can defeat any adversary, so long as we persist!
Our flame gutters and gasps. Will it forever die?
We may bend, but shall strike back more ferociously.
Battle, at last! I will savour it!
Let history repeat; let my victory be heralded!
These foes have strong spirits, but we must overcome them!
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
Be wary, be cautious. They are not friends…

My life is in these lands, and there are none who will take that from me. No fight, no matter how insignificant, is beneath my attention – I will defend our homes against any threats! Those further north look upon the south as theirs to claim, but they will soon know that the White Tiger is here, protecting his people – any who intrude will face my savage claws!
My ambition cannot be halted by… by you!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Last time, my spirit overcame yours. Will it again?
I will defeat you, and redeem myself.
Finally, you will face my blade, cur!
Zhu Que rises in the south; summer burns!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Let us get to the business of slaughter, then!
You all talk too much! Fight me!

The land of my brothers, the dynasty of my blood - they suffer under corruption and rebellion. Those who would follow me are loyal friends, acting in defence of a land so cruelly struck by injustice. Together, we can right these wrongs! The time has come; I must rise above my meagre birth, for the good of the land, and realise my potential!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
They are ready, why aren't you?
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Only through brute strength do you survive. Bah!
Not all buds become mighty oaks. Some must be pruned.
You speak with honour, brother.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Our enemy will surely be bored to death by now.
Yes! You speak almost as well as I do!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Victory goes to the mightiest! Let it be us!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
They will find only defeat at the end of our blades.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
You may well be correct, let us see.
My friend, how has it come to this?
Again, and again, and again we clash!
If you fall in battle, try to do so with honour.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
I am worth a thousand than any of their allies!
I beg of you, silence. No more empty rhetoric!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
They cannot be allowed a foothold here!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Our long rivalry ends here, fiend!
You speak with honour, sister.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
You spew nothing but bile, be silent.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
We must battle, it seems. There is no other choice.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Their days are numbered. This is all they have.
They are defenceless without this force. Defeat it!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
Cowards! Can you not fight alone? Hah.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
If we crush them here, they shall never return!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Ah, nothing quite like regular sport!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
We must crush these insects!
Long have I awaited this…
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
May I recommend more effort this time, perhaps?
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
I cannot stand your wasteful words. Be silent.
This war truly has torn us asunder, friend.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Fight, knowing that the path behind you is in ruins.
Friends, we are of harmonious purpose.
I will not miss you, should you die.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
War cannot break our spirit, nor our kinship!
My days are long. Filled with doubt. Where does this lead?
Considered words, friend; now let us prepare!
Come along; fight now, or die. It matters not.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Now, friends, together let us claim victory!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Treason, like any infection, must be burned away…
I am glad to have you here, friend.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Prove your worth; come on!
I have come for these traitors!
Win here, and the lion's share of their might disappears!
Enough, enough! No more idle chatter. Fight!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Please, be silent. We have more pressing matters.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Do not weaken your resolve in this oppressive heat.
These rabble may fight bravely, but they must be defeated!
I spit at you, scoundrels!

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands – prepare to die!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Let victory manifest like breath on the wind!
Let us be done with this.
Now we must do our part! Let us go!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
You are my enemy, and a villain to us all!
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
My friend, how has it come to this?
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
You have chosen poorly, old friend. Very poorly.
All our ambitions ride on this battle. Do not fail!
Together with our allies, we will redeem China!
Fate is cruel, but I WILL have my victory!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Did they not learn last time? Very well
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
This cannot go on. We either win, or die!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Remain unchanging, even as the world changes around us.
The rebellion is bigger than us both, friend.
When you speak, I groan. To business!
I hope you prove to be an earnest companion.
War is good for the soul. Glory, moreso.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Friend, you have strayed far, too far…

You are a powerful warrior, Sun Ce, and a sincere man. It pains me greatly that we must fight, but such is the way when two principled men fight for their ideals. I will fight with all my strength and  hope that whoever wins can forge a better China.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
As the trees begin to grow, we too must strike out.
The fallen leaves shall be stained with enemy's blood!
They have over-committed. Defeat will cripple them.
Most hated enemy! I am coming for you!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
This is the core of their strength. Destroy it!

Never doubt that China needs me, now more than ever. Yuan Shao thinks to play the game, too, yet he fumbles at the board blindly, inelegantly. While he builds his forces, southern warlords and rebels scrabble to carve out their own petty empires. But a lust for power and glory are not the defining qualities of a great leader, as they will soon discover. Though my enemies are numerous and well-armed, most of them are fools, and they will all be destroyed.
I will always return to fight. Always!
Let us be done with this.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Focus! Your purpose is war, not oratory.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
This is not a wholesome battle, nor will it give us glory, but it must be done.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
When this is done, I will kill you.
Unpleasant business, this, but all the same… deal with them.
Why must you be here. Why you?
They march gladly to their doom!
No matter what, let unity be our strength, brother!
I seek harmony. You bring discord. Be silent.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
Let our bond never be broken!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?

All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Do we still fight for justice? Prove it!
Ours is the strength of the earth: indomitable!
This is not noble work, but it is necessary all the same. See it done.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
I do not need help, but if they insist…
The barren land gives no quarter. Neither must we!
Together, my old friend, we can forge a new China, a better China. Let us see to it!
I will exact a blood price - penance for treason!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Time for them to die.
Ack! Another emperor in waiting. Utterly boring.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Unpleasant business, this, but all the same… deal with them.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Our fires burn brighter together!
Do not forget how these ones fight. Be bold!
I will take great pleasure in your downfall!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Let none stand in the way of our duty.
The world desires our victory; let us not disappoint!
From these walls, we will send them to their graves!
These foes again? Let the past inform the future.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Victory through overwhelming power. A valid strategy.
You are a vermin and you will be purged!
We stand upon the precipice; time to fight!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
We shall hold fast as one, even as everything burns.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
We should move quickly. Once we are done here, we can move on…
I will crush you into dust!
Poor fools! Hear the roar of the tiger!
They are defenceless without this force. Defeat it!
We must win! The alternative is death.
If we should die, at least we die together.
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
Break through the freezing air to victory!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
You cannot forestall my plans. I will see to that.
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
You are the enemy of reason.  You must fall.
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
I am not asking you to win, I am TELLING you.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Allies. Hah. Numbers alone cannot overcome us.
Today we cut not the branches but the very root!
Defeat tastes bitter, but drives us to vengeance!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
After victory, there will be time to reflect and think…
When you are done here, we shall move on. Do not dally.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Now, with me! I tire of this talk!
Now, fight! Seize victory however you can!
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
The dance of nature slows, and we march.
This day we will crush their resistance for good!
I sense the killing strike is at hand!
Wisely spoken, now let us do your words justice!
Your prattle is of little help! Fight, instead!
There is no time to waste; let us fight!
Nothing but empty words! Prove your worth!
You are traitors to China! I shall cut you down.
We are beyond their petty attempts at disunity.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
We must battle, it seems. There is no other choice.
Hated vermin, prepare to die!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
We must fight all the harder against this punishing heat.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Aggressive newcomers; they must be defeated.
Fight hard, for defeat may be our end!
There is still fury in the setting sun…

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Yes yes, fine words indeed. Shall we fight now?
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Let those words carry us to victory.
This will be no different to the last time.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
With me, allies! I will lead us to glory!
We shall leave nothing but their broken bodies!
Now we fight! The people must be given peace.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Together we will tear these imbeciles to pieces!
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
I will cut down this traitor myself!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Let no odds dampen our zeal; victory shall be ours!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
To save China, I must end these enemies!
I drink to them, for their foolish persistence!
I must focus on duty and not our friendship…
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
They will be drowned by our strategies.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
We must crush these insects!
That is certainly an opinion.
Our blades will not dull. Not ever.
This grisly affair must be done. Let us do it quickly.
You enjoy the sound of your own voice, don't you?
We fight because it is our duty!
Choose your words more carefully…
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Focus! Your purpose is war, not oratory.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Now! Put them down! Treason is intolerable!
How dare they back ME into a corner!
Insufferable oaf! I have no time for you!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
Now is the time for war. Later, for speeches!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
A storm is coming. It will sweep you all away!
I will break your bones! I will have justice!
War comes, and together we are ready!
They will soon be erased from history.
I grow impatient! Are we fighting or not?
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
It is time. Our unified strength cannot be overcome.
Your zeal is admirable, but ultimately foolish.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Arrogant to try to beat me again, is it not?
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Please stop talking, and let us go to war.
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Well said. Let us look forward.
My friend, how has it come to this…
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
If our paths must cross a hundred times, so be it!
Did you forget the last lesson? Very well then!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Stay strong and resolute, victory will be ours!
Bring me glory amongst the falling leaves!
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Flow like a mighty river, unyielding in the drought.
It is time to end this, finally, forever.
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Come, ride with me now; to battle.
I much prefer fighting alongside you to fighting against you; such ferocity is terrifying in an opponent, and in a wife!
No quarter! I will tear you limb from limb!
My friend, how has it come to this?
I should cut out your beastly tongue.
Be silent. The only response to treason, is death.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
It is always good to fight a worthy opponent!
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
My loyalty is unwavering, as is my blade!
We will find victory one way, or another.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Let us strike now, whilst the iron still seethes!
We should move quickly. Once we are done here, we can move on…
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
We must do what is needed, for China.
Our enemy will soon know our primal fury!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
They have fought bravely - grant them a swift death.
You may well be correct, let us see.
They must be weak AND stupid, to fight us again!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
We shall hold fast as one, even as everything burns.
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
The price of crossing me is death.
Though we do not share a name, I do most certainly call you brothers! For we shall live, and fight, and die as one!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
We stand on the precipice of destruction. We cannot falter!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!

If a nation lives and dies on the strength of its heroes, then I could surely forge a nation to endure forever. I am loyal, have been loyal, yet as the rot creeps amongst my kin, I know I must act as sword and shield both, defending my kin whilst fighting for my own people. If I am to have a legacy, let it be one of strength and unrelenting victory!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Let rational thought herald victory.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
The world must die, that it may be reborn. Come.
Quite. So, we stand before battle. Let it come.
Never relent, even as winter slows your bones.
Today we give them over to the fire!
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Fight with your all, and victory will be our reward.
With unified purpose we go forward!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
I will flow and repel, time and time again.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
You cannot slow me down. Nobody can.
Your words, and my strength, shall cut a path to victory.

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
In my eyes, you are lost. Prove me wrong!
Let those words carry us to victory.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
They cannot endure a defeat. So we shall defeat them.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
There is a furious truth to your words, sister!
Though this may seem unfair, know you are working to a higher purpose.
Come. Let us go forward to battle.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
If you do well, I may let you live.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Channel your fury and let this gruesome business be done quickly!
We must win! The alternative is death.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let us end this!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Draw your blade, brigand! I will cut you down!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Bah. Do the world a favour and begone.
Bring your strength, sworn kin, and they will fall.
Nature is renewed. We, too, must refresh our purpose.
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Come now, comrade, the enemy waits for death!
You speak true.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
They do not know the fury before them.
Do not disappoint me, friend! Bring us glory!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
Battle is my sworn burden, even though it pains me.
Let these fools rush to meet their doom!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
The time for talk is over. Shall we fight?
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
Find peace within, though the body swelters.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
You speak true.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
We must overturn our dire luck. We must!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Victory belongs to the strongest. Let it be us!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Stand tall against these tumultuous waves!
Fate can be cruel, but I can be far, FAR more cruel!
Be wise in battle, and glorious in victory!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
If we must fight, then so be it.
Time for them to die.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Was I not merciless enough last time? I see…
Fight with all your might. You may even do well!
Do not prove my worries correct. Please.
We must crush these insects!
