Mop them up and let's be off.
Yes! Together, we will bring harmony to China!
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Do not rush to battle, or their allies will overwhelm us.
Come now - do not embarrass yourself. Very well.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
I am perfectly capable of fighting them alone…
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
Fight, fight, fight! The alternative is death!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress - by such criteria, it cannot be you.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
In the end, traitor, you have undone yourself.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Have these dogs no compassion!? We must defeat them!
You speak with honour, sister.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Our combined fury will surely overwhelm them!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Do not disappoint me, friends. I am unforgiving.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
The harvest shall be strewn with their blood!
It is time to end these dogs once and for all.
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
This will be no different to the last time.
Though battered, we shall never break.
The people look to you with admiration. As do I.
In victory our ambitions are realised - let us go!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
I shall share the glories of victory with you!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
I know you. I know myself. I cannot lose.
Let our duty be as bright and determined as the spring!
Such talk is to be expected from you!
This will be no different to the last time.
Long have I waited for this moment…
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
May Xuanwu guide us through this frigid season…
The chaos must be purged. We must purge it!
I welcome all new challengers! More slaughter!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Be brave, friends. Be strong. Dot not waver…
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
What wise words! You speak with beauty!
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
As the trees begin to grow, we too must strike out.
I cannot wait to fight alongside you, friend!
It is time, craven! Time to feel my blade!
We must be as patient as the blossoms.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Know your enemy… remember these words!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Ever onwards, friends. Eyes forward. Once this is done, we may rest a while.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Envision an ideal China, then make it reality.
Speak less. It pains me to listen to you.
We shall reap both the harvest and our foes!
We stand upon the precipice; time to fight!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Hold fast against these traitors' words. They know nothing!
A storm brews upon our ocean. It is… disconcerting.

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Hah. Maybe so, old friend, but there is courage in what we do now, do you not think? We are fighting for all of China!
My days are long. Filled with doubt. Where does this lead?
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Come along, your words can wait.
Bring your best, my sister, and we will be victorious!
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
We must fight through the cold, for China!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
It is time to die, traitor.
Everything is on the line. Do not fail.
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
I feel these newcomers are not gracious folk…
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
You may well be correct, let us see.
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Again, and again, and again we clash!
Let us see if you can at least fight…
I am better prepared than when last we duelled.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
We must be swift, before we all freeze here.
I have come for these traitors!
I unravelled this one's strength before. I will do so again.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!

The emperor must be defended - this is known. Yet the government must be upheld by those with wisdom and authority; in this way I may yet help. Although my father fell from imperial grace, there is much I can do to restore his name, and prove my own worth!
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
I am sorry, friend, but there is nothing left to say.
Let us put strength behind those words, my friend!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Your alliances will not save you. Nothing will!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their … superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Time for them to die.
For China's sake, we must hold here!
Brave action now will lead to victory!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
The shadows grow long, the nights grow darker…
Do not consider defeat, it is NOT an option!

Show caution, they say. Do not underestimate Cao Cao, they say. But he is just a jumped-up bureaucrat, with no real claim to the glory of the Han. Yet I am the inheritor of noble lineage, in possession of extensive northern holdings and an army of considerable strength. I am also burdened with advisors who are far too willing to tell me what to do, but I know my own mind, and it is my destiny alone to bring the whole of China under my control!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
The ice claws at us, but ignore it. Focus!
We are returned, stronger than before.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
The leaves fall, but we must remain resolute.
Do not waste time; it only delays your defeat!
Do not oppose me. You should have learned.
I am not alone. You do not stand a chance!
Death and rebirth. An endless cycle…
Live or die, I expect your best.
We shall see victory, through bold endeavour!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Ah, the 'Little Conqueror' marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!
There is a furious truth to your words, brother!
They know not who they face. Poor, naïve fools…
A drink to the new season, and to battle!
Today is the beginning of their end.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
Kill them quickly. Then we can go.
Long have I waited for this moment…
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Traitors! I will burn the heart from you!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
We shall stand amongst their broken corpses before long!
One, by one, they will all fall!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Harmony can only be achieved through victory over adversity.
Our roots run deep. Brute strength cannot upturn them.
Come along, your words can wait.
It is time we finally settled the score…
There is no time to waste; cut them down!

Some belittle me for not thrusting myself forward with greater zeal, sword upraised and battle-cry on my lips. But I understand well enough what must be done, and will always seek the sensible way to achieve my aims, even at the cost of personal glory. Now, as rebels and upstarts prepare to do battle and press their conflicting claims, I will take the field myself, and do all I can to ensure that the people of China inherit the peaceful future they deserve.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Time is of the essence. This task is menial, but it must be done.
Let our bruises remind us; we must do better!
You shall wither beneath the scorching rays!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
It is a good day for traitors to die…
As the last time, I shall show you only fury!
As the seasons turn, an old enemy returns…
I spit at you, scoundrels!
No. Not like this. I refuse!
Chaos reigns. But who is its architect?
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
There's glory to be found amongst their ruined hope.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Your words are NOTHING. Be silent and die!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy
I do not care for words - only action!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Let us speak more later, after the battle.
This war must be won. Let us win it together.
Aye! Through our actions, let us avenge the nation above, and pacify the people below. There are many paths, but we walk the same one, together!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
We must cut these traitors down.
Are you strong enough? Show me.
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
From your tutelage, Father, I have grown and learned. Perhaps, one day, I will surpass even your legacy.
That we might see tomorrow, we must win today.
Time for them to die.
Repel them! Send them back with nothing!
We will work hard for victory this day, brother.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
You will hang from these barren branches.
Begone, you witless fools!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Another rousing duel? Why not!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
I will see you burn, should you fail!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
The tide rises against you, traitor!
My friend, how has it come to this…
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
A litany of errors has led us to this point…
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Not all buds become mighty oaks. Some must be pruned.
We stand upon the precipice; time to fight!
My determination wavers. It is an ill omen…
Once a faithful companion. Now an enemy. <sighs> So be it.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Their names are irrelevant. Only that they oppose me.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
The law must prevail over our friendship.
To cross me is to invite your own destruction.
Prepare, knave! A reckoning comes!
We must still fight, despite our bond.
Another bout? Another defeat, my friend.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
It is well, friend, that you are here.
Our patience is rewarded with this final battle.
Do not lecture me on war. Draw your swords.
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Let those words carry us to victory.
How will you fight this time? Shall we see?
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
This is more than our struggle; it is China's
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
The air cools. These are favourable conditions.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
You distress me. Do your duty. Be silent.
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
This battle is our chance to hurt them, perhaps fatally.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
That we might see tomorrow, we must win today.
The world wakes, and we leap into action!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Finally! I've been waiting for this moment.
It is time to die, traitor.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Hah! Your words carry power, brother! Let us go!
Now! Bring honour to yourself, and death to your enemies!
Your dignity shines like a beacon. Let it lead the way!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
I am heartened by your words, friend. To battle!
I shall crush you beneath the cresting sun!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
It is time we finally settled the score…
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Their deceit ends now, with our victory!
If there is fire in your heart, let it show!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
This gutless coward dares to face us?
It seems our blades must clash once more.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
You are a vermin and you will be purged!
Let those words carry us to victory.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
I doubt your potential. Prove me wrong.
I will have victory over you. I must.
Our fury will burn them to cinders!
Let my rage drive me to victory against this foe!
A stranger tide washes upon our shore…
The branch that breaks is no longer of the tree…
They shall soon see, fire cannot be tamed!
I will enjoy crushing your skull, dog!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
Throw them back! Their tyranny is not wanted here!
We have thought long enough. Now, battle is come.
Bring victory quickly, so that we may continue.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
How true! Now let us go forward!
Another battle? Make it worthy of my time.
A conqueror is just another word for victor. If victory is to be my namesake, then I accept it gladly. I shall see victory, for myself, for my ancestors, and for China!
And so, we fight, with all the courage we have!
It is as you say. Come, sister, battle awaits.
Today, we look death in the eye. Hold that gaze!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Be fierce, allies, be proud. We shall show them!
Another bout; I must not make the same mistakes…
Do not become an obstacle to my ambition.

My life is in these lands, and there are none who will take that from me. No fight, no matter how insignificant, is beneath my attention – I will defend our homes against any threats! Those further north look upon the south as theirs to claim, but they will soon know that the White Tiger is here, protecting his people – any who intrude will face my savage claws!
Aye! Through our actions, let us avenge the nation above and pacify the people below. There are many paths, but we walk the same one, together!
I must focus on duty and not our friendship…
Well said. Let us look forward.
Together we are a tidal wave, sweeping away our enemies!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
I relish the chance to take my sword to you!
Let those words carry us to victory.
You cannot thwart my ambition, traitor!
Through constant battle, we gain understanding…
When battle is done, we will feast!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
You speak with honour, brother.
I am unmoved by your hollow rhetoric.
We must endure through this savage summer sun.
It is time to destroy them, do you not agree?
When this day is done, we shall be victors!
This will be no different to the last time.
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
Aggressive newcomers; they must be defeated.
Together we burned bright. Now, I must go alone.
Do not lecture me on war. Draw your swords.

Sun Ce! If we were not brothers by birth, then we certainly are now. We have shared peace together, and now we shall share war. Yet when it is done, know that we have much and more to do together, to restore China to glory!
You cannot overcome my ferocity. Why even try?
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
I will savour this opportunity. At long last...
The forests grow, the plants blossom, and war comes.
Comrade, let us seek wisdom and victory together.
Be fierce as the earth hardens. It matters not!
Do your best. Try not to die.
Seldom do these chances come along. I shall relish it.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Leave them bleeding amongst all the pretty flowers.
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
None can best me in a bout, but feel free to try!
Let our ardour keep us warm!
Come now, send them back to the weeds!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Silence, traitor! I shall burn you to cinders!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
I have come for these traitors!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
In unity, we will strike our enemies down!
Let us see what you can do, then.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
It is time we finally settled the score…
The glories of this city are ours alone!
Now, be driven - like the hurricane - to victory!
I shall make short work of these fools.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Treason can face only a deluge of justice.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
I hunger for revenge!
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Come along, your words can wait.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
In unity, we will strike our enemies down!
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
It is time for battle, for bravery, for honour!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
The moon bids we be victorious; do not disappoint!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Uproot their strength here, and they are done!
Nature shifts, but our vision must be singular, unyielding.
We must war, even in this unforgiving climate!

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
The people must be defended from these savage invaders!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Enough! Cowardly dog! I am coming for you!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
History will not remember me if we fail here.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Opportunity is presented to us, friend. Let us seize it.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
There can be no backing down. Victory or death.
I expect you to fight, not talk, so get to it!
We will not yield. We will endure!
These vagabonds and ruffians must be brought to heel.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!

As I look at what has befallen my country, I believe it is time I took up arms against those that wound her. Behold me, enemies of China, for in me you will face an unstoppable foe. You face Guan Yu, God of War! You face your doom!
Give it your best shot - I am waiting!
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Be wise in battle, and glorious in victory!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Let the sun rise over a new China - our China!
Treacherous coward; prepare to face justice!
With your death China will be a better place!
Together we are a tidal wave, sweeping away our enemies!
Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn – I think him overzealous!
Potent words, all - let your actions be mightier!
At last! I am going to rip you to pieces!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress – by such criteria, it cannot be you.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Beneath the watchful moon, we do bloody battle!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
What cowards bring allies to fight!?
We must crush these insects!
Do not presume you have the right to speak.
Another battle? How many now? Very well…
A series of miscalculations has led to this…
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Fight with fury - there is no turning back!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Please say no more; battle is waiting.
Be bold, for history is on our side!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose

So I meet the Crouching Dragon at last; my patience has finally been rewarded. They say you are a most brilliant strategist, and a loyal comrade. It is a pity, then, that we are on opposing sides. Yet as with all the others, you will fall - my ambition cannot be stopped!
I must have a victory. I MUST.
As nature fades, so too must our enemy.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Cast these fools aside so we may return to business.
We have brought many to seize victory. We cannot consider defeat!
Try again, if you like. Prepare for disappointment!
You cannot halt the future of China!
If they die today, their strength will be spent!
Their loyalty will cost them their lives.
Bring as many as you like; I'll burn you all!
The sun beats down, but we must press on.
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
We move with victorious momentum. It cannot be stopped.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
They're brave, truly, but foolish! Break them!
I am China's fury; you cannot stop me!
I tolerate you, no more. Win today, or die.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Be swift, and smart, and we will see glory.
Overcome this horde, and the enemy will be hobbled.
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Any enemy of mine is an enemy of China!
You are savage opponents, but we will not relent!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response; death!
Stout words, but they are empty. Bah.
My friend, the war awaits. Shall we?
I must be the sword of justice that slays you.
Sage words, friend. They shall echo through history.
The sun is at our back; victory will be ours!
Well said. Let us look forward.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!

Ha! They call me barbaric, and short-tempered, and a DRUNK! HAH! These things may well be true, but I swore an oath to protect China from the DOGS who would rip her apart, and on that oath - and THIS wine - I will see it done.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
We must persist. Everything depends on it!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
You have a bold spirit. Let us fight as one!
I welcome any opportunity to hone my skills.
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
There is warmth to be found once battle is done.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Sweep them away, and do not think of the cost.
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Stay true to the cause, and victory will come.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
Until we are free, we will fight you.
It is time to die, traitor.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
Aggressive newcomers; they must be defeated.
We have endured much, brother, for our cause.
We have no choice but to win today.
Do not let our past victories twist into foolhardiness!
Are you strong enough? Show me.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
Words are but wind. Let us show decisive action!
Beneath the hues of autumn, battle is joined…
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Greedy dogs! Go back to your hovels!
My blade sings in anticipation of another duel!
No force, no power can stop my ambition!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Their lands will be free to claim. Defeat them here!
With this strike, I deny you!

At long last, we shall rise! The Azure Sky can be tolerated no longer - the Han must be torn down, and a new dynasty raised in their place. The people suffer for a lack of food, for a lack of leadership, for a lack of compassion. We shall be their voice: heaven's voice! Let none stand against us - they will be swept away by our tide of righteous fury!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
The world desires our victory; let us not disappoint!

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Do not stop. Kill them all. Overwhelm them!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Yes, yes. Now show me what you can do!
Time marches on, so must we! Come, come!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
With a heavy heart, but noble purpose, we must fight.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
All stand before the law, no matter who they are.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
As the world cools, my ardour rises.
That is certainly an opinion.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
A new season in the relentless march to victory.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
There is strength in mystery. Do not be arrogant.
Do not waste time with words - your reckoning comes!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Talk less! Fight more.
That is certainly an opinion.
We have no choice but to win today.
Honour must be regained. Victory must be claimed!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Our mighty tree stands alone against the deadly typhoon…
Their general is a cunning warrior. Not, I fear, cunning enough.
You speak true.
This will be the last mistake you ever make.
We have committed much; do not squander this opportunity.
Why are you here? I can handle this alone.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
All of China freezes. We must be her still-warm heart!
There is strength in mystery. Do not be arrogant.
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Time for them to die.
The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Let us be brave, bold, and unrelentingly lethal!
You are unworthy of my respect, traitor.
Your words are fair, but it is time for action!
My spirit cannot be dimmed by you.
Proud words, sister! To the battle then!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
My friend, how has it come to this?
Another bout? Another defeat, my friend.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Nature's twilight cannot break our ardour!
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Well put! Brother, let us be bold!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
You speak with courage; let it carry us aloft!
Be mindful; do not underestimate this foe.
Failure will leave us exposed. We must succeed!
At last, I can reward you for your deceit!
I offer you a chance at redemption. Do not disappoint me.
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
If we must fight, then so be it.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Your spirit is impressive. Mine more so.
Our past victories are righteous; let our future be so.
Yes, friend, well put. Now, may we do that justice.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
So we fight again. It is becoming tiresome.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
I will see you burn, should you fail!
It is time to take our fight to the enemy!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Allies! What luck! Together we'll crush them!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
With earnest hearts and righteous fury, we march!
There is a furious truth to your words, sister!
Be brave, as I know you are. Come!
I must answer all treason the same - with fury!
Push these brigands back! Defend the city!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
The world wakes, and we leap into action!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
You speak. I listen. But now, we must BOTH fight.
We will not yield. We will endure!
Battle approaches! The price of treason is worse than death!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Too many times have we tasted defeat. No more!
You speak true.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
May I interject? You bore me. Fight!
We have to push them back. The alternative is unthinkable!
Proud words, brother! To the battle then!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
A shame that we must now cross swords.
Choose your moves carefully; fight with wisdom.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Witless idiot. Your prattle tires me.
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Time for them to die.
Old adversary, you are tenacious!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
You and your deception shall fall today!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
We must defend this city, it is our duty!
We shall see victory, through bold endeavour!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
This campaign lacks care, lacks thought..
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Fair words, sister, let us bring them fury!
Oh, who comes now? New enemies to fight?
It is time to die, traitor.
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Yes! Show fury in your words and deeds!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Our cause is just! We should never relent!
Defeat cannot slow me. I will have victory.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Today, our freedom hangs in the balance!
They have brought so many to die…
Dormant buds now burst forth into action!
Again and again, we must clash.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
You're in my way! Move or die!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Our diligence has borne fruit. Now, onwards!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Come, brother, let us strike them down!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
I am here to fight you, not listen to this nonsense.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Battle is coming, whether you are ready or not!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
They wish to waste allied forces too!? Hah, fine.
Another rousing duel? Why not!
As the wind conveys change, let us carry victory.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Brigand, face your death!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now let us fight.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
No matter what, let unity be our strength, sister!

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
I am done with your words; done with YOU.
Your worst crime is your lack of honour.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Come, cowards! Your crimes are answerable to me!
Be wise in battle, and glorious in victory!
Bend but never break. Always remember this.
Our strategies must be flexible. Through change, victory.
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Talk is done; let us kill these traitors!
If our paths must cross a hundred times, so be it!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Too many bouts to count. And another? Fine.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
We shall wash these insects away in righteous deluge!
Aptly spoken. There is nothing we cannot overcome.
They seek strength in numbers? Let them try.
I cannot abide traitors. You, dog, will face justice!
…we know these ones and their ways. Plan accordingly!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
So much talk, yet such little substance. Please, focus!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
You are WASTING my TIME!
Yes. Well spoken. Now let us focus on the battle.
Your words need more fury. Are you craven?
Yes, brother! We shall fight together always!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!

If a nation lives and dies on the strength of its heroes, then I could surely forge a one that would endure forever. I am loyal, have been loyal; yet as the rot creeps amongst my kin I know I must act as sword and shield both, defending my kin whilst fighting for my own people. If I am to have a legacy, let it be one of strength, compassion and unrelenting victory!
For China's stability, we must dispatch with these fools swiftly.
Comrade, let us seek wisdom and victory together.
They face their doom! Crush them!
It is time to answer for your crimes, traitor!
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
I do not have time for unknown quantities.
A stranger tide washes upon our shore…
Will these new foes bend to our will?
I am sorry that I must do this, friend.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Come, my sworn companion, we ride to battle!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
It is the unknown, creeping vine, that can choke the mightiest tree.
Did you not learn your lesson!?
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
The branch that breaks is no longer of the tree…
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
No. I will not break. I refuse! Not… not now!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
I am furious like the blazing sun!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
They have brought allies; I feel we can handle them.
I have come for these traitors!
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Save your words; let them know destruction!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
They will be drowned by our strategies.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
I am sorry that your family were in my way, but the price of treason is death. So it has been, and so it shall be again.
Be quiet. You stall before death.
At the head of the charge, I will seize stolen victory!
The savagery of my strikes will rend them asunder!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Be fluid, friends, and we will rush to victory.
We must crush these insects!
China's vitality wanes. Only I can save it!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
I do not need to hear this! We have work to do!
I am sorry, but I will not relent.
Storm these walls. Take this city. Let them vanish!
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Our goals are noble - truly worth fighting for!
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Your words lack courage! Show me action!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
No agent of destruction can be allowed beyond these walls!
Our cause is worth the effort; the determined effort!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
If they die today, their strength will be spent!
Glory and fame shall be mine!
You cannot hope to stop me.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
My friend, how has it come to this?
The cold bites at us, yet we must march.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Don't give them even an inch. They will die here!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
They cannot have the efforts of our toil!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
I have justice on my side. You cannot overcome that.
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Brave allies! Together we are unstoppable!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
So to battle! Let skill and courage drive us to victory!
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
If we must fight, then so be it.
I vow I will defeat you. I shall!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
You are a mighty bough; unbreakable! It is comforting.
You may well be correct, let us see.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
We must look to our future... China's future.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
It is on us to reverse the misfortunes of fate!
Quite finished? Shall we do our duties now?
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
The enemy is waiting; let us not loiter!
Are you done? I grow impatient.
We must crush these insects!
Past victory is no guarantee of future victory.
We must be brave, in the face of the enemy.
Brutality is all they understand; speak their language!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
We must win! The alternative is death.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Their deaths here bring us closer to liberation!
Our bond is forged in the fires of war!
Today we give them over to the fire!
You speak earnestly, and inspiringly. Now look to battle.
Our cause is just. We shall overthrow these despots!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Harmony behind us. Harmony ahead.
You speak with honour, brother.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
Keep your resolve, even as the dark encroaches.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Ah, the 'Little Conqueror' marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Much is asked of us, but for what?
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
I am Guan Yu; enemies tremble before me!
Your words are wind. Fight, at last!
You must always be faced down, and defeated!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
We must hold this place!
Enough; to battle. You have sown enough discordance!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
You speak with honour, sister.
You and your deception shall fall today!
Come, friends, come, allies - to war!
If we fall here today, all will be undone.
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Do they not know who it is they face?
Fortune gives you another chance - do not waste it!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
China will be free when it is united, as we are.
Any obstacle can be overcome by our unyielding spirit!
Envision an ideal China, then make it reality.
Strong words, brother!
The outcome may be grim, but it is not foregone.
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Let purpose drive you through the bitter chill.
No more words of worry or woe. Only victory.
Our cause is righteous. That is enough.
Are you ready to fight? Or yet more words?
They have allies? More for the slaughter, then!
You have chosen poorly, friend. Very poorly.
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
You speak with honour, brother.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Our last victory still lingers on my blade.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
A bright and fresh new day, perfect for battle!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
I shall not falter before a challenge, you shall see!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
We should be cautious. Together, they are formidable.

The wise general is the Lord of Destiny; he holds the nation's peace or peril in his hands! Brave warriors of the south; we hold the fate of China in our hands! We must forge onwards, as China can only know peace through bravery, honour and loyalty!
They seek strength in numbers? Let them try.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
China will only know stability through our victory.
They are ready, why aren't you?
Be bold, for history is on our side!
This would be scarce worth my time, yet all treason must be rooted out and destroyed!
I long for your silence, that we may finally fight.
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
My brother, do not hesitate! Strike at their hearts!
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Stand tall, for today is the day of our victory!
It is time to die, traitor.
Nothing can stand in our way. Especially not this rabble.
Today they will fall, and we shall ascend.
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
A drink to our new enemies! Now kill them!
Can you endure the torturous sun? Then you can fight!
Time to go! Time to fight! Time to win!
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
You speak, but I hear only deception.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
We will work hard for victory this day, sister.
Our cause feels clouded... obscured. We must find purpose.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Hold firm against their might; victory through resolve.
The sun is punishing; we must be moreso!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Speak less! Your very presence aggravates me.
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
It is time to die, traitor.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
There is no option but victory. Let us go!
Our allies shall be guiding lights in the dark!
Victory does not require your prattle. Only your sword.
Destroy them all. Complain about it later. Or better, not at all!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
No more honeyed words - to the fight!
The time is now to enact those intelligent words!
Do not waste my time with treacherous talk!
These new foes will soon bend to our will.
We understand each other. Let us go forward as one.
Today, there may be greatness for all of us.
Battle is upon us - let us give it our all!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
I will relish tearing out your verminous heart.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
You cannot quench my thirst for victory!
Bend but never break. Always remember this.
They are strong. Let us be stronger still!
You again, old foes? Shall we go again?
Victory before. Victory again!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Let us be done with this.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Be cautious! They bring allies, to inundate us.
Together with our allies, we shall cast off these chains!
Spoken well, friend! But now, we must fight!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Must every new face be that of an enemy?
Just so. Now, battle; show your strength!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
This one is pestilent; he must be removed!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
It is time we finally settled the score…
The future is clouded, and disharmonious…
We must throw off the oppressors' chains!
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
I shall wait for you, don't rush!
I have come for these traitors!
Together, friend, China will be free.
Past glory is no guarantee of future victory.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
It will ALL crash down. We will see to it.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Let no odds dampen our zeal; victory shall be ours!
Treason can face only a deluge of justice.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Your ambition has been laid bare, Lord Cao. Order cannot be restored under your name, but under a prosperous and just Han restoration. You have no place there!
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
Summer heat is our true enemy this day.
Why are you here? I do not care for you.
You are a worthy opponent. Again!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
It is time we finally crushed this foe.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
The duty of your penance falls now to me.
You are a dog and will die like one!
Never break, even before the most furious strength.
Today is another step towards restoring order.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
I shall lead the charge against this swine!
Bring me their liar's heads!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
You cannot prevail, no matter how you try!
Ours is the path of clarity and stability.
The opportunity to exact justice on you. Come!
Let us be done with this.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
We will work hard for victory this day, brother.
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
My determination wavers. It is an ill omen…
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
If we crush them here, they will be forever broken!
Was the last bout not enough for you?
There is no glory but that which we seize for ourselves!
We should be cautious. Together, they are formidable.
Our only option is victory - see it done!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
The sun is capricious; it both gives life, and drains it.
We must be as the incoming tide - relentless!
They call me bad tempered? Hah, they know nothing!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!

Sun Ce! If we were not brothers by birth, then we certainly are now. We have shared peace together, and now we shall share war. Yet when it is done, know that we have much and more to do together, to restore China to glory!
A feast awaits us, on the other side of victory.
Battle comes! The time for words is over.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!
So... we gave it our all, did we not?
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Let our hearts of fire melt these freezing winds.
We must focus on battle, not on your redundant thought.
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
You speak with honour, brother.
When we are done, there will be nothing left of them.
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
They cannot be allowed a foothold here!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
This path we walk is fraught, but is it the right one?
You dogs lack the intellect to learn, it seems!
This is what we were born to do, brother!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?

My friend, long have we known one another, and long have we fought together. Since we were students under Lu Zhi, to the fracturing of our nation, to now. I hope that together, we can use all we have learned to rid the land of this chaos!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
It is time to face the end. Time to die!
As ever, we must not relent before these foes.
If we must fight, then so be it.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Give these dogs nothing but fire and fury!
The love I once bore you will not save you.
Their ambitions shall burn this day!
China cannot wait a moment longer - to war!
Restore the balance. Crush these usurpers!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
You stand in the way of my ambition. Time to die!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Beware; threats are everywhere.
I must be wiser. I will be. You will fall.
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I believe in you. Do YOU believe in you?
It is time to consign them to history.
Enough! I am past patiently waiting! China rises!
I loathe you, but perhaps you can fight…
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Come, friend, the battle calls to us.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Do not fret; allies come to aid us!
Craven curs! I will see you all cut down!
Let us be as furious as the blazing sun.
Be wise. Keep your wits about you. Kill them.
Do the only thing you can, fool - fight!
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
We have met before. We know them, and they us.
Everything is on the line. Fight, for your very lives!

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Let us be done with this.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
Here; our full might, for our army to witness!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Why are you here? I can handle this alone.
Things will be different this time; this I vow!
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
They will soon be erased from history.
Kill them slowly, brutally.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Cold, dispassionate winter. Graveyard of the naïve.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
You speak with honour, sister.
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Look how they falter, withering beneath the heat!
You may be terrible, but you can fight.
Your rule is corrupt and destitute! It must end!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
How many of these battles must I fight for you?
Push them back! They will not triumph!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Let China's new beginning start here, my friend.
Silence. Your words bring disharmony. Come; fight.
Quick work - dirty, but necessary.
How many times must you try?
We cannot let ourselves feel the sting of defeat again.
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Let none stand against our unified strength!
They cannot overcome our combined wits, friend.
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
We have no choice but to win today.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Winter is a fury all its own. Cold, and bitter.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Having thought on my defeat, I have decided: never again.
No matter what, let unity be our strength, brother!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Watch out; it is dangerous out there.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
If I remember correctly… yes yes, these ones again…
They must be weak AND stupid, to fight us again!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Temper rages against resolve; we fight these dogs again!
All men die the same - these are no different!
Be patient. Be vigilant. We will lead these fools to destruction!
Some trees flourish. Others must die...
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
You speak with honour, brother.
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!
I will hunt you down, like a mange-ridden beast.
One final strike, and they are forever destroyed!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor - by such criteria, it cannot be you.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
Must you talk? It brings nothing but pain.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Like the mighty bamboo, we endure and thrive.
Can you fight with even HALF my strength? Hah!
Now, victory awaits to he who fights the hardest.
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Spring is rebirth and victory; let us be also!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Every enemy has potential strength. Be cautious.
There shall be a great feast when victory is ours!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Ice-cold steel; it calls for victory.
The cowards cannot fight alone, it seems.
Long have I waited for this moment…
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Though the world is reborn, its purpose remains unchanged.
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Hold fast, and fight. To fail is to be destroyed!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
We have passion and zeal. Do not waste it!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
You spew nothing but bile, be silent.
That is certainly an opinion.
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
What new warriors are these?
You disgust me! Do your duty, damn you!
They are all here; a harmonious convenience.

Long have I suffered the slander and scorn of my peers, of my own kin. Now I shall return their good grace. If China is to be ruled by a strong leader, then neither my kin nor the other bickering fools will suffice - it must be me. After so many years, finally, they will see my brilliance.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
First they will die. Then, perhaps, you.
So much rests on this outcome. Bring victory!
Do not fail. The shame would be unbearable.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
Together they may be dangerous. Be wary.
Summer bears down like an inferno. We must endure.
I will drown our enemies in a tide of justice!
I shall fight without you; do not bother me!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Are we destined to fight these foes for all eternity?
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
You sow disorder, and must be vanquished.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Come on, come on! I need vengeance!
Finally! I will cut you to pieces!
Old foes burn brightly! I enjoy our battles!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Please stop talking, and let us go to war.
The wave of revolution cannot be stopped!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
We must uproot our foes, whoever they may be!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
This will be no different to the last time.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
You will regret ever crossing me.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Should this city fall, we shall face dark times.
Things will be different this time; this I vow!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Newcomers deserve our respect and our caution.
Change is marching, let us meet it!
Aye! Through our actions, let us avenge the nation above, and pacify the people below. There are many paths, but we walk the same one, together!
All this talk masks your fear. Come on, battle is calling!
Time for them to die.
May we be the mighty branch; they the falling leaves.
No time to hesitate; our foes must be crushed.
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
We must look to our future... China's future.
Should you fall, the earth will grow strong from you.
Their most serious crime is that they are in my way.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
There are no others I would trust in this battle!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Find harmony in the falling leaves…
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
That they survived our last encounter is astonishing.
The days may shorten, but we cannot rest early.
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Give them no quarter. Make them know pain.
Cowards and turncoats will face my rage!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
I shall seek this traitor out and make them pay.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Behold these villains, undeserving of even your rage!
Liberation through unity. Our unity.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
You speak with honour, sister.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Let us see your strength. China is watching.
At last. It is time for this traitor to fall.
You cannot stop me once my mind is set.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Like a vine, you are choking the life from China.
Be wary, be cautious. They are not friends…

Chaos shakes the ground beneath us all. I have risked all on maintaining good relations with Han and tribe alike. The slightest error could turn their favours against me, like meat to a ravenous tiger. I must not waver, and, when words fail, be ready to pursue my agenda with steel and rage!
It is time to take you to task, traitor.

Can you feel it? The change in the air? The Han must feel it, closing in on them. They have but one purpose now - to end. All across the land, the people hear our call, and know their long suffering is finally over. Together, we will ascend, sweeping away this broken dynasty, and restoring peace and prosperity under heaven!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous empress – by such criteria, it cannot be you.
Ah, spring. New life. New hope. New China.
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
This fight goes ever on, does it not?
Your prattle is of little help! Fight, instead!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
I will make this quick. You have earned that.
It was unwise to commit so many to this fight…
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Blossoms on the branches; passion in our hearts!
Now we must face each other? So be it.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
You will be drowned by your injustices, traitor!
It is time their names became history…
We must crush these insects!
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Give them only death, and justice!
Let us do battle beneath a burgeoning sun!
We must win! The alternative is death.
Yes! May your words be a call to arms!
No time to wait! Their end approaches!
I will cut through their allies. They cannot run!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. <laughs> Now, again?
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Even in winter, bamboo does not break; stay strong!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
As the moon ascends, so too must we!
Your skill is why you are here, not your tiresome words.
I will fight you AND your allies. It matters not!
We are beyond their petty attempts at disunity.
Traitors fester like cockroaches. They must be stamped out!
Together, friend, nothing can stop us.
That is certainly an opinion.
Today let us be showered in glory, friend!
This war will be won by our combined strength!

I have lived long, and seen much, but never did I think I would see Liu turn upon Liu. The betrayal is not only to your brothers and sisters, but also to the Han - if the dynasty is to ever survive, then these treasons must be quelled - by force, if required...

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
I will rip these dogs apart!
There is strength in your words. Come, then.
Come along, are you done? There's a war to win!
Prove to me, brigand, that your intentions are honourable!
We have no choice but to win today.
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Today they will fall, and we shall ascend.
It is sad that we must fight, but unavoidable.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
There is no turning back, so do not entertain it!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
I cannot look back, friend. Only ruin lies behind.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Come, my sworn companion - we ride to battle!
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Do not fret; allies come to aid us!
Now go, give no quarter, for I surely will not!
Do not worry about defeat. Think only of victory.
Is battle to be joined? I have other things to do…
Their friends come; they too will taste defeat!
Your strength is impressive. I must overcome it.

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Ah, we meet again! To battle, then!
Destroy them all. Complain about it later. Or better, not at all!
Push them back! They will not triumph!
The enemy awaits; let us not keep them much longer!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
At last. I need to unleash some anger!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Battle is here, friend; let us meet it!
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Remain loyal to me, and I will see us through!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their… superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Friend, you have strayed far, too far…
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
It is unpleasant business, but let us be quick and merciful.
Our duty remains, even in this savage heat.
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Single combat will determine your fate.
Talk is done; let us kill these traitors!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Fight hard, and maybe you too can be like me!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
We have no choice but to win today.
Time for them to die.
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Do not fret, allies come to aid us!
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
I, for one, shall forget these fresh faces.
You spew nothing but bile; be silent.
Here, we commit all our energy. Victory is essential.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
All enemies will fall. Order will be restored.
You may well be correct, let us see.
