So many of my kin turn not only on one another, but on their emperor too. He is their chosen lord - they must kneel, anything else is treason. If I stand to defend him, and punish his enemies, I will surely be seen as a most capable leader. This is my chance!
We rise like a blazing inferno, destructive and unstoppable!
Now, victory awaits to he who fights the hardest.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Servants of anarchy, you will be put down again.
Treacherous coward; prepare to face justice!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
There is no other I would wish to battle alongside!
Victory belongs to the strongest. Let it be us!
China is better for you being in it, brother!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
We shall fight together, brother, once again!
Our foes will crumble under our combined might.
There is still fury in the setting sun…
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Let us be done with this.
Keep your resolve, even as the dark encroaches.
Let us enjoy the glory that awaits.
Must you continue to bother me? Fight instead!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
Guan Yu cannot be beaten! But do try!
Spoken wisely, as ever. Now, let us fight.
Winter. Bah! I hate winter! Let us be quick!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Do not lecture me on war. Draw your swords.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Focus! Your purpose is war, not oratory.
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
Long have I waited for this moment…
Throw them from the walls. Give them nothing!
I will always return, even after defeat, for vengeance.
We must still fight, despite our bond.
I am done with your words; done with YOU.
It is a mercy we bring today, no matter how unsavoury!
Why am I saddled with your burdens?
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Frustrating foes! I will have my victory!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Be bold, for history is on our side!
My friend, how has it come to this?
When these walls fall, so do they. Let us end this!
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
The enemy are bolstered by allies. Feeble hand-holders!
Constant defeat wearies me. I must win!
See to these oafs quickly and efficiently, then we can move on.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
More is required, if I am to continue fighting your wars…
Draw your sword, comrade, because battle calls!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
We fight each other again? Always a delight…
They are brazen to come here. And foolish.
And who are these? Bah, it does not matter!
It is time we finally settled the score…
Put simply, you must be cut down.
I cannot let it end like this. How … humiliating.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
We must win! The alternative is death.
Are you done speaking? Show me some spirit!
Our full strength was demanded, so we have brought it.
Wash these fools away. They are not worthy of our time.
I shall repay your past kindness a thousandfold.
You speak earnestly, my friend…
I have come for these traitors!
Our enemy will soon know our primal fury!
Our strength is arrayed. Let them know death!
Time for them to die.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Battle approaches, and we cannot back down.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
It is a crime that you must remain, but you must.
You may try and try, we will never waver!
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Like the mighty Yangtze, overcome these tenacious foes.
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Let us be done with this.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Leave no trace of them! NONE!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
Speak less. It pains me to listen to you.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
Let nothing deter us today, friend.
Your words are comfort. Shall we?
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
The moon bids we be victorious; do not disappoint!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
They must be weak AND stupid, to fight us again!
The hour of battle has come. Fight with me!
To save China, I must end these enemies!
If it is to be defeat again, so be it…
My friend, never let your ideals flicker!
Keep your eyes on the ultimate goal, brother.
There are few I would not kill. You, sister, are one.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
Are you afraid? Hah, how quaint.
Push these brigands back! Defend the city!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.

The land weeps for a lack of thought! The imperial court is infected with corruption, and the land rots into rebellion as their leaders grow complacent. I am without title now, but I will still resist how I can; knowledge only dies when there are none left to fight for it!
If you cannot be useful, then die.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
All is at stake! Defeat is death!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Together, we shall forge a path to victory!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
It is a good bright day to fight!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Let battle be joined amongst the blooming world!
My friend, how has it come to this?
You speak well, but words will not avail you.
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Bloodlines. 'Destiny'. 'Dynasties'. How… tiresome.
We must fight harder if we are to win!
I can hardly endure you. But I must persevere…
If we should die, at least we die together.
At last, I can reward you for your deceit!
Like the mighty bamboo, we endure and thrive.
China weeps to see so many enemies of truth.
I beg of you, silence. No more empty rhetoric!
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
Let none stand against our unified strength!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
They are strong together. We must be stronger still.
This is what we were born to do, brother!
I wish them an honourable defeat, but nothing more.
Your words are strong. Let your sword be stronger.
Let the turn of the seasons not dissuade us from our purpose.
Ah, I tire of these frequent frays!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
Your determination is noble, but will be fatal.
I feel a rot set in. I worry…
The cold bites at us, yet we must march.
I find you disgusting. Pray stay away from me.
Summer is a raging inferno. Harness its power!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
The only option is your total annihilation.
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
New faces? New foes! Have at them!
Let these newcomers try; they will taste defeat!
Shall we then? War waits for nobody.
Will these new foes bend to our will?
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
My heart breaks at what I must now do, friend.
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Now, the tiger moves for the final strike…
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
Today, I will crush them. Forever.
Yes! An enemy at last! Come, fury!
To think, that you could cost us victory…
Time for them to die.
A series of miscalculations has led to this…
How arrogant to think they have the right to invade!
I believe in you. Do YOU believe in you?
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
I applaud your boldness, but it is useless.
Courage against the dying of nature. Come!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Now, China watches; fight in her name!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…

Long have I waited for this moment, Lord Cao. I do not know if you remember, but you have butchered countless members of my family. I can no longer suffer this injustice; I shall cut you apart - that you might know a fraction of the pain I feel.
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Their corpses will soon litter the battlefield!
We either fight hard to survive, or we die.
Cut down one after another until there are none left.
This is the core of their strength. Destroy it!
Though we do not share a name, I do most certainly call you brothers! For we shall live, and fight, and die as one!
Today we end their struggle. Forever.
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
It is time to die, traitor.
If you die, I will be glad.
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
Our strategy rests on this victory. We cannot lose.
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
This battle is our chance to hurt them, perhaps fatally.
Yours is the worst treachery, damn you!
I shall measure your worth in blood…
They must be weak AND stupid to fight us again!
Stand tall, and vibrant, even as the world sheds its life.
There is no other I would rather fight with today.
Do not waste my time with treacherous talk!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
Did they not learn last time? Very well
An honourable battle is victory in itself!
Be bold! Be brave! Be victorious!
Come along, your words can wait.
Are you finished? Very well. To battle then.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Proud words! Together, our strength will be boundless!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Show no fear, no matter the odds!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
This victory will bring us one step closer to liberty…
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
Plainly, I do not trust you. Watch yourself.
It is a blessed day for war! Let us fight!
Even the air itself freezes. It portends a bitter clash.
Burn them away, salt the earth, do not relent!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
You speak with honour, brother.
I wonder sometimes what it is we fight for…
We must crush these insects!
Can you keep up? Focus on your duty!
From these walls, we will send them to their graves!
You speak with honour, brother.
I am undefeated, but you may try…

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands – prepare to die!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
We have no choice but to win today.
Come, to battle! We will not be slaves again!
Your words are calming, sister. To the battle, then?
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Hm. Come then, there is work to do.
What have you become, my dearest friend?
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
All of China now watches; conduct yourself with honour!
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
Bamboo stings so savagely, does it not?
The world will be remade as *I* desire it!
Traitor, you stand before the executioner.
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Bring your fury - we will surely need it!
Now, China watches; fight in her name!
Did they not learn last time? Very well.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Teach them the folly of this incursion. Kill them!
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Your strength will lead us to victory, friend.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Excellent words; even I could not do better.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
We must crush these insects!
There is still fury in the setting sun…
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Who are they to challenge me? Ha.
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Victory before. Victory again!
Nature is renewed. We, too, must refresh our purpose.
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Talk is easy. The difficult business of war is imminent.
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
I will not squander this opportunity to exact justice!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
This place WILL remain ours, now and tomorrow!
The cold bites at us, yet still we must march.
As the cycle begins anew, keep focus on our cause.
Sister, today we fight for all of China!
They will fall! I am a force of nature!
We are carried aloft by revolutionary zeal!
We must be willing to bend, but never break.
Be smart, and be thoughtful. They will not stand a chance.
I will give you the chance you desperately seek!
If we must fight, then so be it.
You all talk too much! Fight me!
It is time! Show me what you are made of!

I have been lucky: through the blood and toil of others, power and influence came to me early in life. I would be a fool to squander such good fortune with hasty action or unjustified arrogance. While Warlords bicker, seeking personal glory at any cost, and the greatness of the Han wanes and fragments, it is the duty of those with vision to work towards a stable future. He who shouts loudest is often the least fit to rule, and China is more than any one person, even if that person claims the title of Emperor.
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Your treacherous path ends with me, rat!
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
I will not miss you, should you die.
Back up your words with strength and fury!
A new China blossoms, friends. Let us see it through.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
We must crush these insects!
We must win! The alternative is death.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Not all trees can live. Some must die…
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
You have much to prove, and very little time.
I must break you apart. ALL will burn!

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
Today, let us combine our strength in singular purpose.
Brother; today we fight for all of China!
Finally, I will put an end to your disharmonious deeds!
Nature's constant renewal should inspire us all!
Do not let the heat concern you; only victory!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
We can rest in the shade when this is over.
I must think further ahead to defeat you.
Strong words, sister!
They are a blight on all of China.
It is time to die, traitor.
Nature sheds her skin. But we must remain steadfast.
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
I shall run this traitor through!
My dignity demands I best you.
Yes, sister! We shall fight together always!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Here we begin; let us fight to the end.
Failure is your fate. Again and again.
Irksome toad! Prepare to meet your doom!
They are cloaked in anonymity. Be mindful.
Relentless heat; I must have your molten resolve.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.
Come, at them again. We WILL win!
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
Know your enemy, keep your wits about you.
Draw your blade, brigand! I will cut you down!
I am perfectly capable of fighting them alone…
I shall have my vengeance, I vow!
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
Two moves ahead. That is how one sees victory.
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you now, friend.
Ah, the Little Conqueror marches. He thinks himself Xiang Yu reborn - I think him overzealous!
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
We have work to do today; let heaven observe!
You speak with honour, brother.
Another bout? To the fray, then!
I welcome any opportunity to hone my skills.
Cut our enemies down as rice in the field.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!
By our deeds, there will be prosperity under heaven!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Fight, damn you, fight! Show me your courage!
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
You are not stronger 'united'.
You speak with honour, sister.
Focus not on the enemy, but yourself. Then, victory.
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
You stand accused of treason, you savage dog!
Your words do not reach them. Only action will.
Now we take the fight to them! Give no quarter!
For all this talk, the enemy still breaths. Onward!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Who are they to challenge me? Ha.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
These dogs have slighted you. Now, for revenge!
I welcome any opportunity to hone my skills.
Together we will overthrow the corrupt!
When battle is done, we will feast!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
Instability threatens to undo all our work…
Spring buds entirely too slowly. I desire action!
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
There are but two options; victory, or obliteration.
Such talk is to be expected from you!
You speak earnestly, my friend…
Warmth lies on the other side of victory!
I have heard enough! Battle comes!
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
With our allies alongside us, we cannot fail!
The time to be bold is now!
Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.
Defeat stings me, but I will have my vengeance!
You are a traitor and shall be washed away!
One sharp strike, and they are gone forever!
The enemy cannot hope to stand against our alliance!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Fate has granted me a chance for vengeance!
All traitors must face the sword! Let us go!
You speak with honour, sister.
Let us flow as one and wash our enemies away!
Do not hesitate. Victory must be achieved.
A good fight and the promise of fame. That will do.
Have faith in me! I will carry us to victory.
When battle is done, we will feast!
Yet again, fate calls us both to battle!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Kill them before the sun does! Simple.
China will thank us for doing her swift and brutal work.
This is their last chance. Take this city; vanquish them!
My friend, how has it come to this?
Like harmony and balance, victory can be fleeting.
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
I can ask no more than you do your duty.
We have no choice but to win today.
Another duel? After last time? Hah, bold.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Everything is on the line. Do not fail.
Fight harder than before and we shall know victory!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
We bend but never break. Through this, we see victory.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Come; wipe their miserable treachery from history!
Brother, today we fight for all of China!
You are a cretin; your presence offends me.
This is it. We cannot waste this chance!
Come, again we shall bout. You shall lose.
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
You speak with rightful fury! Let us fight!
It is time we finally settled the score…
I will not hesitate. This battle is mine!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
Can you truly bring victory? Truly!?
Yes, friends, let us go forward as one!
I've no time for fair-weather friends!
Come, fury! Carry us to salvation this day!
In our last bout, I emerged victorious. Now, again?
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
No more discussion - bring me their treasonous heads!
This is not a wholesome battle, nor will it give us glory, but it must be done.
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
You must be defeated. Traitors must die!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
Now is the time for endless determination!
I am given an opportunity for redemption? Gladly!

So you, too, claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
I will destroy you for daring to cross me!
Let us strike now, whilst the iron still seethes!
We have no choice but to win today.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Our cause has need of victory; I will provide.
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
Only through their defeat can China be free.
It is as you say, friend. War is our only option.
Know your enemy… remember these words!
It is time to grind these peasants into dust!
Clear minds will overcome any obstacle.
I am torn; my loyalty is tested…
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!

Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Hold fast, and fight. To fail is to be destroyed!
I have brought you for your strength. Nothing else.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
I loathe you, but perhaps you can fight…
We can win, if we are bold!
If we fail here, our light extinguishes forever…
It is as you say, friend. War is our only option.
Yes! Together, let us bring these vermin to justice!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Know that what you today, you do for a better tomorrow.
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!
No time to ponder the morals. Only swift action will bring swift victory.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
Come, my friends. Let us fight well.
There is much work to do. Deal with this, quickly.
The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
In the name of stability, I must cut you down, friend.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
No more! We must fight now, not talk.
Indeed, fine words my friend.
There is no more time; the enemy comes!

There can be no backing down, not even in the face of one so legendary as this! Our intuition and zeal must help us win the day against their … superior skill. Think of defeat as impossible, for victory MUST be ours!
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
An enemy is an enemy, no matter the size.
This place is vital; we must not lose it!
Flow like a mighty river, unyielding in the drought.
Now, take a drink to settle yourself, then we fight!
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
Alone, they are nothing! Even aided, they will fall!
Leave this to me; I will bring us victory!
Enough! Enough! Will you ever give me peace?
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Time is precious. Their lives are not. Come!
This war is an imposition…
You bring disharmony. I pray you aid our cause.
I have duelled this one before, yet they return..
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
Let us put strength behind those words, my friend!
The people rise up! We cannot afford defeat!
You speak true.
I'll cut you apart, you treacherous wretch!
Remember, we do everything for China. Everything.
You speak, but I hear only deception.
Please, be silent. Your voice irritates me.
These cowards cannot even fight without aid!
Be wary of their friends; a united front is dangerous.
If we crush them here, they shall never return!
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
You speak true.
Yes, bring all your allies. I will kill you all
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
brother, I trust your actions will be equally moving.
Who have come to die by my blade today!?
So many who wish China harm. What grim times.
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
It is time we finally settled the score…
This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
Push them back! They will not triumph!
I will not die here. We will not! Never!
Our fire quivers in the wind. We must protect it!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
Let these fools rush to meet their doom!
I will bring change to China. You will bring ruin.
If we should die, at least we die together.
Well said. Let us look forward.
Battle will keep us from freezing! Have at them!
Give not an inch. Throw them back. Crush them!
They gather their strength here. A grave oversight…
Victory will be hastened with friends at our side.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
I have come for these traitors!
You speak earnestly, and inspiringly. Now look to battle.
We must survive. Our revolution must survive!
I shall cut you down, as deserves a traitor.
Friends! Bicker not. Fight me instead!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
I am the stronger for my defeat.
Enough! Show these traitorous scum no quarter!
What power we shall have, together with our allies!
There are riches to be won today, my friend!
If we must fight, then so be it.
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
These dogs shall burn!
Talk is done. Now I will have their heads!
Your skill is vexing, but I will crush you!
Be bold, for history is on our side!

So you claim the title of emperor? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
Come now; be brave, be bold, be victorious!
Our only option is victory - see it done!
If we must fight, then so be it.
Let us now, together, see victory won!
The battle awaits. Let us consider our options.
My friend, let us break this all apart, together.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

There has been opportunity in these dark times - I see you have harnessed it, just as I have. Great heroes are forged in the chaos of China, as ever it has been. Order will rise from disharmony. That you oppose me is disappointing but not… unexpected.
Now, my friends, to war. For China!
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
We must be swift, before we all freeze here.
Come along, your words can wait.
Too much talk! Draw your swords! These traitors shall die!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
We stand on the precipice of destruction. We cannot falter!
Too long have we languished under the injustices of the nobility!

Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
I want to hear their screams!

The bulk of our force is here; defeat cannot be allowed.
Ours is a brotherhood forged in fire! Come…
I will strike you down myself, traitor!
Come. Fight me. I am ready this time!
Take yourself to battle and out of my sight.
Treat both new and old with a warrior's respect.
We shall stand amongst their broken corpses before long!
This city is, and always shall remain, ours!
Yes, quite. Shall we proceed then?
You will bend to my will or be destroyed!
If you fall in battle, I will think it just.
One final strike, and they are forever destroyed!
Silence! You are not required. Begone!
For China's sake, I will let you live. Fight well.
I will knock these fools back, one after another!
If we should die, at least we die together.
Stay hopeful! Let us see to this rabble together.
War comes, it will not wait; rise to meet it!
My friend, how has it come to this?
My foul temper demands vengeance!
What nonsense you talk. May we proceed?
Now GO, seek glory, it will not come to you!
When these walls fall, so do they. Let us end this!
We must crush them here, then claim their world.
Such heat is oppressive; they must surely feel it too…
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
They are ready, why aren't you?
I shall stride into the fray and rend them asunder!
Let us flow as one and wash our enemies away!
In victory our ambitions are realised - let us go!
I am ready, whenever you are done pontificating!

Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
I am proud to call you sister.
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy
You will be drowned by your injustices, traitor!
Fortune smiles upon us; let us not squander opportunity!
Let battle come; I shall greet it alongside you!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
These new ones should fear me. Soon, they will.
I welcome another victorious duel against this warrior.
Win the battle, then I will reconsider your life…
Damn you, I am Dong Zhuo. You SHALL die!
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Together, we shall forge a path to victory!
Though we were not born on the same day, or the same month, or the same year, we hope to die upon the selfsame day. And should our friendship waver, may heaven and the people both strike us down!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
Victory here will leave them defenceless!
Quiet, quiet, quiet! You enrage me.
Give your all today, friends. Tomorrow is waiting.
We must be smart in the face of these new foes.
Well said. Your unrelenting spirit will see us through.
Their numbers are nothing before the strength of our spirit!
You speak with honour, brother.
We must win! The alternative is death.
I have known you long, Gongsun Zan; since we were young students - much more spry and impetuous than we are now I think!
You all talk too much! Fight me!
Nobody hinders Dong Zhuo and lives!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Speak well, friend. Speak well.
No more discussion - bring me their treasonous heads!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
May the moon bless the coming battle!
Today is the beginning of their end.

Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!

We must be willing to bend, but never break.

Fight well, and I may reconsider killing you…
I will burn you to cinders. Revenge!
All traitors will burn!

I have a score to settle; march!
Take care that I do not turn my fury upon you.

Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!

The world gives life, then death. It is nature eternal.
Be as the sun; furious and just.

I require your swords, not your words.
When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!
Brother, I shall follow you to whatever end.
Through our unity, friend, we will seize freedom!
Long have I awaited this…
The land sleeps under an icy blanket.
Our allies will be a boon in the battle to come!
Must you continue to waste air with such talk?
The moon bids we be victorious; do not disappoint!

Together we are a tidal wave, sweeping away our enemies!
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, brother.
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
It is time we finally settled the score…
I advise caution, we do not yet know our enemy.
This will be no different to the last time.
An unknown foe is a dangerous foe. Be wary.
I am glad to be fighting alongside you today, sister.

China will benefit from an ordered mind such as yours, in time. But first, we must bring peace and stability under the heavens!

China is in chaos. Yet through this chaos, I have found opportunity. These people - these bickering people, they stack so well. It makes them easier to order, to control. I alone will bring peace to China. Those who stand against me will vanish.
The country cannot know peace until our enemies are crushed.

An unknown foe is a dangerous foe. Be wary.

At long last, we shall rise! The Azure Sky can be tolerated no longer - The Han must be torn down and a new dynasty raised. The people suffer for a lack of food, for a lack of leadership, for a lack of compassion. We shall be their voice - heaven's voice! Let none stand against us. They will be swept away by our tide of righteous fury!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
So long as we fight together, I fear nothing!

When these walls fall, so do they. Let's end this!

Stand tall against these tumultuous waves!

So you claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!
In dark times, you are a light. Yet battle approaches…
We will look our enemy in the eyes!

Bright days, crisp breezes! Yes, a day for fighting!

Do you not see the way this path leads? Only to your destruction. I have laid claim to the rule of China; the Mandate of Heaven will surely choose me over the rest. You must swear fealty, as all must, or face the blade of the emperor. China will unify, with or without you.
When we are done here, YOU may be next…

So you, too, claim the title of empress? There can be only one chosen of heaven, and by my blade I shall prove that the right is mine. I will not let the Celestial Empire fall into your unworthy hands - prepare to die!

To think that you truly believe that Tian has chosen you? It is nothing but ignorance and folly. You cannot rule China. I have laid no claim to the Celestial throne, but I know that you must be stopped. China must be ruled by a strong, powerful, righteous emperor – by such criteria, it cannot be you.
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
Ready yourself, I intend to win this time!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
Why must you be here. Why you?
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
Let us fight! Battle will warm our freezing souls.

The crisp, fresh air portends a clean victory!

Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!

There is no fury like wounded pride. You will see…
Hold your heads high, and fight for liberty!
I can ask no more than you do your duty.
Victory is a bud now; soon it will blossom!
Defeat still lies heavy on my soul. Never again!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
I vow I will not suffer defeat again!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
This is more than our struggle; it is China's

Find harmony within, then we shall defeat them.
Be swift, and smart, and we will see glory.

The leaves fall, but we must remain resolute.
All our ambitions ride on this battle. Do not fail!
Look before you; an assortment of treasonous wretches!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Now to battle. Let us do what must be done.
My mind is askance, clouded. I worry.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
I shall - no, I MUST - crush you!
Well put! To fight alongside you is honour enough.
Let icy winter come; our fury sustains us!
All enemies of order will be defeated.
Why, my friend, have you chosen this path?
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Do not be disheartened. Fight with all your spirit!

Old friend. Now enemies. So be it.
I take no joy in this, friend. But duty comes first.
Here their tale ends, in fire and blood.
Watch out, it's dangerous out there.
We have committed much to this fight. We must win!
Each brick here must be defended.
Though I suffer, I persevere! Save doubt for later!
Traitors! Dogs! Pieces of dirt!
I will reclaim the victory stolen from me!
You speak well, but you will still die.
You speak earnestly, my friend…
They shall soon see, fire cannot be tamed!

…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Should we see victory today, they will be grievously wounded.
If you must try again, so be it.

Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.
Mercy can come later. We have grim business to do.

What folly! Your words are as impotent as you!

From spring to winter. All is one.

Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!

Commit your all, for all is at stake!

Let our enemies fall, as leaves from the branch.

This adversity is a test. I must overcome these challenges…

Such talk is to be expected from you!

We must win! The alternative is death.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
We will overcome these foes today. We must!

The people have been fed lies and happily devoured them. We must work to put down these insurrections and restore faith in the Han. Yet if battle must be joined to support the dynasty, then so be it. I am proud to serve alongside some of the finest warriors, and together with them I am all-but certain we shall see victory!
How naive they must be, to not know their end approaches.
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
We must still fight together - for my sins…
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
My friend, how has it come to this…
I spit at you, scoundrels!
Victory will be mine. Defeat will be erased.
Without family, what else is worth fighting for?
Let us hope our allies remain steadfast and loyal!
You don't learn, eh? Fine. I'll teach you again!
Indeed, fine words my friend.
Is it to be another bout? I will not lose!
Now, draw your weapons - battle is upon us!
No more defeats. Only victory!
Tear down these fools! Let us fight!
This war will be won by our combined strength!
Like the mighty bamboo, we endure and thrive.
Change is in the air; let us harness this transformation!
Talk is done; let us kill these traitors!
Let us share a drink when this is done, brother!
As the fire fades, we must stay resolute!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
This one, so hasty to taste defeat again?
You may well be correct, let us see.
I am better prepared than when last we duelled.
It is time for us to be heroic, is it not?
Enough talk. You are not long for this world.
Let us flow as one and wash our enemies away!
Victory will be ours, if we hold our nerve.
Save philosophy for the garden; first, kill these dogs!
Today will be a dark day for them…
Pray to Ba, for victory and mercy from drought.
Please say no more; battle is waiting.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
This is it. Wash them away, never to return!
Keep your spirits high, we shall win!
I am here to correct my past dishonours!
You are a tiresome necessity today.
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
The air is fresh - it smells of victory!
There must be some way to defeat this enemy..
There is nowhere your treason can hide!
When you speak, I groan. To business!
Enough talk! Or are you not in the mood?
This fight is just beginning. Let us win!
How true, my friend. Come, to business!
Battle awaits - we must not disappoint!
We are as one mind, friend - we cannot be stopped!
Enough! I hope you fight better than you talk!
The unknown is dangerous. Keep your guard up.
It is time to do our duty and restore order.
There is no option but victory. Let us go!
Let those words carry us to victory.
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
Blossoms on the branches, passion in our hearts!
We have no choice but to win today.

Find your courage, and bother me no more.

This is more than our struggle, it is China's.
You stole glory from me; I shall reclaim it!
Through unity, we will see victory, friend!
Be persistent, and determined, and we will see victory!
What right have you to speak to me? Silence!
Redeem yourself in my eyes, if you can.
Stay focused. Stay FURIOUS, or we are doomed!
Show them your strength, and we will win!
Please say no more; battle is waiting.
We cannot give them an inch. This city endures!
You will bend to my will or be destroyed!
Finally, we meet. Finally, you face vengeance!
Let our spirits be as these walls; unyielding!
Your words are noble. Let us do them justice.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Come, sun. Come fury! To battle!
They are undefeated, but we must still battle them.
…these warriors are strangers to us. Caution is wise.
Do not strain yourself in the melee, friend!
The sun, high and heavy, reflects our weighty responsibility.
You black-hearted wretch! I will cut you down!
Let this general come. I will not fail again!
All those who oppose me will be destroyed.
The heat is relentless; let victory come swiftly!
I earnestly pray that this battle is your last.
They cannot afford this loss. We must hit hard.
Victory against these foes has eluded us. Let us change that!
Our allies will make victory a certainty.
They will find only defeat at the end of our blades.
To battle then, friends. Fight hard, and claim victory.
The past is the past. We grow towards the future.
I am done with your words... done with YOU.
I must have a victory. I MUST.
Together, sister, we will unify China!
Leave nothing but cinders of their dreams!
Come, let sky and sea divine our fate.
Time to burn their hopes away!
Long have I waited for this moment…
We march now, for something greater than ourselves.
Hah. Again to battle with these foes!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
These walls must stand. This city must remain!
Speak less. It pains me to listen to you.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Show no mercy; kill them now! Leave nothing for the carrion!
You are an enemy of the people - you shall die!
Break these cretins, and they will never again trouble us!
In this war of ideals, friends, we have already won!
Every slight, every insult, I will now repay!
Strike at their hearts, and leave them with nothing!
Let us do battle beneath a burgeoning sun!
They may seize victory in this bout. Yet I doubt it.
Let vengeance and justice drive your blades home!
The revolution does not die at the strike of a sword.
They will find no prize here; only destruction.
My friend, your cause is doomed, as are you.
So long as fortune shines down, we shall know glory!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Do not let the heat concern you; only victory!
The time is now to enact those intelligent words!
Enough parlay! Treason has only one response: death!
Show them ferocity, and they shall be broken forever.
Adversity is a test; let us not fail!
You are a treacherous creature; be not so loud.
The past is the past. We grow towards the future.
This is not honourable work, so let us be quick about it.
Do not waver as before. Conquer their strength!
The winds of victory blow in our favour.
This pains me; must we fight? I wish it were not so.
They may try and try, but they cannot overcome our spirit!
I cannot lose. I cannot. Not now. Not ever!
Are words the best you can do? Surely not!?
It is only necessity that stays my blade, vermin!
BORING! I am coming for you!
Much is asked of us, but for what?

It is tragic, yet unmistakable; one of my own kin stands against me today. It is a grim business, to see families torn by war, divided in purpose, but I cannot relent now, even if I must stand against family. The restoration of the Han dynasty is above all else. I must see it done!
We cannot be beaten again. Show no fear!
Allies? Tell them to keep up, if they can!
You may well be correct, let us see.
Our allies rally to us; we are never alone!
Claim victory, and they will be exposed!
With our allies alongside us we cannot fail!
I seek harmony. You bring discord. Be silent.
Your opinions are always deftly delivered.
As the world turns, nature is illuminated.
A band of brigands before us - nothing more!
Time to get to work. There's glory to be won!
Let future generations tell of our glory here today.
You speak true.
Come on, come on, come on!
Let our past defeat ensure our future victory!
Though the sun burns us all, we must do our duty.
Let us be done with this.

Take a look at who we oppose? A general of unknown integrity but insignificant skill. They cannot be allowed to taste even a hint of victory. Crush their dreams now, that they might know just WHO it is they face!
You are a traitor; only death remains for you!
Enough! If you will not fight, I will destroy you!
An enemy alliance? Hah. Their loyalty is admirable but misplaced.
Once more, we are called to defeat these blackhearts.
Our friendship, as it was, is over. I'm sorry.
Plainly, I do not trust you. Watch yourself.
Always several moves ahead. That is how we win.
Never underestimate anyone who may affect your designs…
Finally, their treason will end here!
We shall see who is more dedicated to our cause!
...they have allies, who will try to overwhelm us.
With a sharp, powerful cut, this tree shall fall.
Let those words carry us to victory.
Quite finished? Shall we do our duties now?
Glory will come to us, if we fight for it!
Come now, vengeance, lend me your strength!
